In future, Cecilia hopes to become one of the leading farmers in Ndunyu Njeru area.

loan.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer

loan.name: Mejumaa

texts.en: Mejumaa is a married woman with four children; three attend school while one is still young. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. For the past ten years, Mejumaa has operated a tailoring business, selling in a shop to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of competition from other tailors in the area. Mejumaa dreams of expanding her business in the future. With the Kshs 30,000 she wants to repair her tailoring machine, purchase cloth materials and sewing threads. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loan.use: To repair her tailoring machine, purchase cloth materials and sewing threads.

loan.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther has practiced farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last 33 years. She is 63 years old, married to Erastus and they have six school-going children. She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our field officers and this will be her third loan. Esther repaid her previous loans well and in good time. She plans to use the loan amount to buy seeds and fertilizer. In future, Esther hopes to become one of the leading farmers in Ndunyu Njeru area.

loan.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer

loan.name: Irene

texts.en: Irene is 34 years old, married with two children. She runs a hardware shop to earn a living. She has been operating the business for five years. She has benefited from the business trainings conducted by Faulu Kenya. This has helped her to improve her business. Irene hopes to open other outlets of her business. She has requested 50, 000 Kenya shillings to buy paint and nails.

loan.use: To buy nails and paint

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy food items, fabrics, mobile phones, and agri-food for resale

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer

loan.name: Monicah

texts.en:
Monicah has practiced farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last seven years. She is 43 years old, married to James and they have two school-going children.
Monicah was introduced to KADET LTD. by one of our field officers and this will be her fourth loan. She has repaid all her previous loans well and in good time. She plans to use the loan amount to buy seeds and fertilizer.
In future, Monicah hopes to become one of the leading farmers in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loan.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loan.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a 39-year-old business man. He runs a grocery shop to earn a living. He has been operating the business for over five years. He has used his previous loans from Faulu Kenya to boost his business. His desire is to expand his business into wholesale in the future.
Joseph dreams of opening other outlets of his business in the future. He has requested a loan for 20,000 Kenya shillings to buy potatoes, tomatoes and onions.

loan.use: to buy potatoes, tomatoes and onions.

loan.name: Loice

texts.en:
Loice is 41 years old, single, and a mother of two children (20 and 10 years of age). She runs a beauty salon and she has been in business for 11 years. Currently, her monthly income from the business is KES 20,000.
Loice is borrowing a loan of KES 70,000, with which she plans to purchase salon equipment and materials for hair dressing. She plans to open another salon business in Eldoret town with the anticipated profits from the business.
This is her fifth loan and she has successfully repaid her previous loans. Her hopes and dreams are to continue with her salon business, to buy a matatu (private minibus) for public transportation and to educate her children.

loan.use: to buy salon equipment and materials for hair dressing.

loan.name: Maisha Group

texts.fr: La cliente Kakule, leader du groupe daffaire Maisha , est jeune entrepreneur, ge de 34 ans, marie, mre de 3 jeunes enfants, qui tudient tous lcole primaire. Son mari est un enseignant. Elle est socitaire dune pharmacie. Elle sinstalle dans une officine commerciale. Il y a 13 ans rvolus quelle exerce ces petites activits gnratrices de revenus de ce genre. Cependant, elle vient de raliser 8 cycles avec le crdit de Hekima. Son premier capital fut 300$ reu dun dcompte de son mari, lors que ce dernier travaillait dans un organisme international. Ce nouveau crdit doit lui servir de sapprovisionner avec 5 cartons de mdicaments essentiels et gnriques marchander. En plus, elle souhaite voir ses enfants grandir confortablement et agrandir son entreprise. La cliente remercie Hekima pour ses actions en faveur de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en: Our client Kakule, leader of the Maisha group, is a young entrpreneur, 34 years of age, married and the mother of three young children, all of whom go to primary school. Her husband is a teacher. She is a partner in a pharmacy. She has her shop set up in a commercial building. She has been doing this work to earn a bit of extra income for 13 years already. She just completed eight loan cycles with Hekima. Her starting capital of $300 was received from her husband, when he used to work for an international organization. This new loan will allow her to renew her stock by buying five boxes of common generic mediations for resale. In addition, she would like her children to grow up in comfort and to expand her business. This client thanks Hekima for its work in support of impoverished women who do not have access to traditional banking.

loan.use: to buy five boxes of common generic medications

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loan.name: Nelson Ovidio

texts.es: Nelson, se dedica a sastrera, elabora forro de vehculos y buses, para muebles de sala, l vive con su esposa y su hijo de 6 aos, trabaja todos los das ya que este trabajo es rentable de lunes a domingo. El necesita el crdito para comprar una maquina industrial, el cual le ayudara aumentar sus ingresos y a mejorar el trabajo. El sueo de Nelson es que su familia este ms estable econmicamente, y comprar un lote para hacer su casa.
texts.en:
Nelson works in tailoring, making covers for vehicles and buses and for living room furniture. He lives with is wife and 6 year old son. He works every day, Monday through Sunday, as this work is very profitable.
He needs the loan to purchase an industrial sewing-machine, which will help him to increase his income and improve his work.
Nelson's dream is that his family becomes more stable financially, and that he can buy a lot where he can build a home.

loan.use: to buy an industrial sewing-machine.

loan.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph has been practicing farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the past four years. He is 47 years old, married to Jane, and they have six school-going children. He was introduced to KADET by one of our field officers and this will be his first loan. Joseph plans to use the loan amount to buy seeds and fertilizer.
In the future, Joseph hopes to become one of the leading farmers in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loan.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loan.name: Abahetsi Group

texts.fr:
Jeanne fait partie du groupe Abahetsi. Le nom du groupe signifie transporteurs . Elle est ne au Rwanda et elle a 27 ans. Elle est marie avec 2 enfants de 3 et 5 ans, tous les deux scolariss. Son niveau dducation est 6 ans de primaire.
Jeanne est cultivatrice de riz. Cest son premier cycle de prt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crdit afin dacheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz.
Sa stratgie pour la croissance de son business est de faire la semence du riz slectionn. Dans les prochaines annes, Jeanne voudrait rcolter une grande quantit de riz. Avec les profits, elle prvoit dduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Jeanne is a member of the Abahetsi group. The group's name means "carriers". Jeanne is 27 years old and she was born in Rwanda. She is married with two children aged 3 and 5, both in school. Jeanne herself attended primary school for six years.
Jeanne is a rice farmer. This is her first loan cycle with ACB, and she plans to use the funding to buy fertilizers.
Her business growth strategy revolves around the selected rice seed. In the coming years, Jeanne hopes to produce a large crop of rice and use the profits to provide for her childrens education and healthcare.

loan.use: to buy fertilizers for her rice farming business

loan.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal LAS FLORES DE YANACONA; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco. La socia Rosa Maria; tiene 41 aos de edad, es conviviente, tiene 3 hijos de 23, 20, 16 aos de edad, la socia tiene una tienda abarrotes en sus propia casa, es aqu tambin donde se renen los miembros de banco comunal, la socia vende todo lo relacionado a productos de abarrotes y tambin cervezas, gaseosas, vinos. La socia desea poder invertir el nuevo crdito en la compra de mercadera de abarrotes, ella comprara arroz, al por mayor, azcar, fideos, harinas, leche, embutidos, paales, y otros, la socia es una de las pocas que abastece al poblado, hace unos meses atrs con el derrumbe que sufrieron ellos se quedaron 3 das desabastecidos de productos, por esta razn la socia ahora que comenzaran las lluvias desea poder abastecer a la comunidad, para ello implementara su tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de abarrotes como fideos, arroz, azcar, harinas, leche y otros. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Rosa Maria is a member of the "Las Flores de Yanacona" community bank which is located 10 minutes from Yanacona, Urubamba, in Cusco department.
Rosa Maria is 41 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children aged 23, 20 and 16. She has a grocery store in her own home and this is where the members of her community bank meet. She sells groceries and also beer, soda and wine. Rosa Maria would like to be able to invest her new loan in buying groceries. She will buy rice, sugar, noodles, flour, milk, canned goods, diapers, etc. wholesale. She is one of the few people who supplies her town. Some months ago, following the landslide that they suffered, they spent three days without products. For this reason, now that the rains are about to start, Rosa Maria would like to be able to supply her community by stocking her grocery store.
Rosa Maria is requesting this loan to invest in buying groceries such as noodles, rice, sugar, flour, milk, etc. She is grateful for the loan she is being given and values it. She pledges to continue making her monthly repayments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to invest in buying groceries such as noodles, rice, sugar, flour, milk, etc.

loan.name: Reuben

texts.en:
Reuben, 22 years old, is a single and hard working man. He has practiced livestock farming in Ndunyu Njeru town for the last two years. He was introduced to KADET LTD. by one of our field officers and this will be his first loan. He plans to use the loan amount to buy sheep, which he will sell later.
In the future, Reuben hopes to become one of the leading farmers in the Ndunyu Njeru area.

loan.use: to buy sheep, which he will rear and sell later.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase a circular saw and timber.

loan.name: Marcia Bernica

texts.es:
Marcia es una mujer de 44 aos, casada y madre de 2 hijos que actualmente estn estudiando que tienen 10 y 13 aos de edad. Vive con su familia en la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tschilas" en una parroquia de la capital llamada "Ro Toachi", ubicada en el permetro urbano. Su esposo Gonzalo es supervisor en una empresa de servicio de agua y alcantarillado pblico desde hace 13 aos.
Desde hace 4 aos ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso cosmtico y uso personal. Esta actividad la empez por motivacin propia para as poder aportar econmicamente a su hogar. Este mes existe una liquidacin de productos por lo que Marcia desea invertir en esta oportunidad, de esta manera, si los productos los consigue a menor precio ella podr obtener ms ganancias. Es su primer crdito en el sector financiero y es que Marcia est convencida de que esto le ayudar a tener mayor ingreso para su familia.
Marcia nos cuenta que lo ms complicado del negocio es convencer al cliente, es por esto que ella diariamente trata de mejorar su manera de expresarse. Trabaja las horas que sean necesarias para poder lograr sus ventas ya que su meta es tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marcia is a 44-year-old woman. She is married and has two children, aged 10 and 13, who are currently in school. She lives with her family in Santo Domingo de los Tschilas province, in a parish in the capital called Ro Toachi which is located on the outskirts of the city. Her husband, Gonzalo, is a foreman in a company that provides water and public sewerage services. He has worked there for 13 years.
For four years, Marcia has been selling cosmetics and personal care products. She started this business through her own motivation so that she could contribute financially to her household. This month there is a closeout and Marcia would like to invest in this opportunity. If she can obtain products at a lower price, she will be able to make more profits. This is her first loan from the financial sector and Marcia is convinced that it will help her to make more income for her family.
Marcia tells us that the most complicated part of her business is convincing her customers to buy. This is why she tries every day to improve how she expresses herself. She works the hours that she needs to in order to be able to make her sales. Her goal is to enjoy a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy a batch of items that are on offer

loan.name: Elsa

texts.es: La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal LAS FLORES DE YANACONA; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco. La socia Elsa; tiene 28 aos de edad, es conviviente, tiene 3 hijos de 9, 5, 1 aos de edad, La socia se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, para la venta la socia cra chanchos, ovejas, gallinas, cuyes para criar, reproducirlos y venderlos, la socia desea invertir este crdito en la copra de chanchos, ovejas y gallinas. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de animales menores en esta ocasin comprara chanchos 2, ovejas, 4 y gallinas, 6. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
This member belongs to Las Flores de Yanacona communal bank, which is located 10 minutes from the city of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.
Elsa is 28 years old, lives with her partner and has 3 children ages 9, 5 and 1 year old. She raises small animals such as pigs, sheep, chickens and guinea pigs to reproduce and sell them. She wants to use this loan to purchase pigs, sheep and chickens, specifically 2 pigs, 4 sheep and 6 chickens.
She is grateful for and appreciates the loan provided and is committed to continue making her payments on time.

loan.use: to purchase small animals, specifically 2 pigs, 4 sheep and 6 chickens.

loan.name: Coumba

texts.fr: commercante au march central de this une ville qui se trouve a proximit de la capital du Sngal. Elle s'active depuis plus de 2 ans dans l'achat et la revente des tissus et basins riches .Ce prt lui permettra de rendre sa porte feuille plus active dans ce domaine ou elle tend a faire des efforts pour l'achat de marchandises dans le bon fonctionnement de son commerce. Avec une appuie purement financiere cette commercante peut mener a bien ses activits et d'avoir des profits pour la ralisation de l'ouverture de sa cantine afin de ne plus louer pour stocker ses marchandises.
texts.en: This woman is a merchant at the central market in This, a city close to the capital of Senegal. For over two years, she has been involved in buying and re-selling fabric and damask of the "riche" type. This loan will allow her to diversify her portfolio in this field, in which she has made efforts to extend her purchase of goods in order to run her business well. With financial support alone, this merchant will be able to run her business well and earn a profit in order to realize her ambition of opening her own store and thus avoiding the need to rent a place to stock her merchandise.

loan.use: to buy fabric and damask for resale.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: To buy fish, fabric, jewelry, sheets, and perfume for resale.

loan.name: Haidee

texts.es: La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal LAS FLORES DE YANACONA; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco. La socia Hayde; tiene 32 aos de edad, es casada, tiene 2 hijos de 17 y 7 aos de edad, La socia se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, para la venta la socia cra gallinas y las vende, ella cra pollos, de doble pechuga y luego cuando crecer los lleva a vender al mercado en Urubamba al por mayor, la socia trabaja comprando y vendiendo pollos, gallinas, gallos, la socia se dedica a la comercio de gallinas, en esta ocasin la socia desea poder comprar 40 aves para criarlas y reproducirla, y luego d esto venderlas en el mercado y ferias. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de aves de corral pollos y gallinas, para la venta. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Hayde is a member of the "Las Flores de Yanacona" community bank which is located 10 minutes from Yanacona, Urubamba, in Cusco department.
Hayde is 32 years old, married, and has two children aged 17 and 7. Her business is raising animals. She raises hens and "double-breasted chickens". When they have grown, she sells them in the market in Urubamba wholesale. She works buying and selling chickens, hens and roosters. On this occasion, Hayde would like to buy 40 birds to raise and breed, then sell in the market and street markets. She is requesting this loan to buy farmyard birds (chickens and hens) to sell.
Hayde is grateful for the loan that she is receiving and values it. She pledges to continue making her monthly loan repayments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to invest in buying farmyard birds (chickens and hens) to sell

loan.name: Nicolasa

texts.es: La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal LAS FLORES DE YANACONA; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco. La socia Nicolasa; tiene 42 aos de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos de22, 18, 16 aos de edad, La socia se dedica a la atencin de su tienda de abarrotes, la socia tiene sus propia tienda en la cual vende arroz, fideos, leche enlatados, aceite entre otros, la socia desea invertir el crdito en la compra de productos de abarrotes, como arroz, azcar, fideos, leche, mazamorras, y otros productos, como huevos y galletas. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en al compra de productos de abarrotes para la venta. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
This member belongs to Las Flores de Yanacona communal bank, which is located 10 minutes from the city of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.
Nicolasa is 42 years old, married and has 3 children, ages 22, 18 and 16. She owns and runs a grocery store, where she sells rice, noodles, canned milk and oil, among other items. She will use her loan to purchase merchandise like rice, sugar, noodles, milk, boiled corn and other items, such as eggs and cookies. She will purchase these products and then sell them.
She is grateful for and appreciates the loan provided and is committed to continue making her payments on time.

loan.use: to purchase grocery merchandise to sell.

loan.name: Yaneth Dora

texts.es: La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal LAS FLORES DE YANACONA; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco. La socia Yanet; tiene 23 aos de edad, es conviviente, tiene 2 hijos de 6 y 3 aos de edad, La socia se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, para la venta la socia cra gallinas y pollos, ella en especial cra pollos al por mayor, la socia los lleva a vender los sbados y domingos en el mercado en Urubamba, la socia tiene 200 pollos los cuales ya tiene un comprador y ella requiere el crdito para comprar comida, la socia tambin les comprar vitaminas, una ves que ella entregue le pagaran en dos partes, por lo cual ella requiere el prstamo y tambin para comprar 200 pollos mas. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de alimento y vitaminas para los pollos y comprar 200 pollos. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Yanet, 23, is a member of the Las Flores de Yanacona communal bank located ten minutes from the town of Urubamba belonging to Cusco Department.
She has a spouse and two children who are 6 and 3 years of age. She raises small farm animals to sell. She raises chickens and chicks. She specializes in raising chickens at wholesale. She takes them to sell at the Urubamba market on Saturdays and Sundays. She has 200 chicks that she already has a buyer for and she needs the loan to buy feed; she also wants to buy vitamins. Once she delivers them, shell be paid in two parts so she needs the loan to also buy 200 more chicks. She requests the loan to invest in the purchase of feed and vitamins for the chicks and to buy 200 chicks.
She is grateful for and values the loan granted and commits to continue to make her monthly installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to buy feed and vitamins for the chickens and to buy 200 chicks.

loan.name: Abadahemuka/kzr Group

texts.fr:
Theophile fait partie du groupe Abadehemuka et sur la photo est le monsieur qui a de l'argent. Le nom du groupe signifie les fideles . Il a 45 ans. Il est mari avec 6 enfants de 2 15 ans, dont 5 scolariss. Son niveau dducation est 6 ans de primaire.
Theophile est cultivateur de riz. Cest son premier cycle de prt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crdit afin dacheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz.
Dans les prochaines annes, Theophile voudrait tre le meilleur agriculteur dans sa valle. Avec les profits, il prvoit dduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Theophile belongs to the Abadehemuka group and is the man holding the money in the photo. The name of the group means "the faithful." He is 45 years old, married, and has six children between the ages of 2 and 15, of whom five are in school. His own level of education includes six years of primary school.
Theophile is a rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He is going to use is loan to buy chemical fertilizers for growing rice.
In the coming years, Theophile would like to be the best farmer in his valley. With his profits, he intends to educate and take care of his children.

loan.use: To buy chemical fertilizers for growing rice.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy rice, sugar, cheese, and chicken.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: To buy fish, vegetables, and clothing for resale.

loan.name: Oliver

texts.es: El seor Oliver, trabaja en una consultora de auditoria como asistente de oficina y tambin vende ropa. El crdito lo requiere para el aumento de capital de trabajo y comprar ms ropa, como ser: chamarras y deportivos. Vive en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona de san pedro en la ciudad de La Paz, es divorciado y tiene un hijo. Oliver es cliente nuestro desde el ao 2009 y esta es la primera vez que su crdito ser canalizado a travs de Kiva.
texts.en: Oliver works as an office assistant for an accounting firm and he also sells clothes. He needs the loan to increase working capital and buy more clothes like: jackets and sportswear. He lives in his parents house which is located in the city of La Pazs San Pedro zone. Hes divorced and has a son. Oliver has been our client since 2009 and this is the first time his loan will be channeled through Kiva.

loan.use: to buy jackets and sportswear.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy fabric in order to make clothing.

loan.name: Martha Elena

texts.es: La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal LAS FLORES DE YANACONA; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco. La socia Martha; tiene 56 aos de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos los cuales todos ellos son independientes; La socia se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales menores, la socia cra cuyes, gallinas, chanchos, y los engorda y vende, la socia lleva a vender sus animales menores al mercado de Urubamba, la socia ahora desea el crdito para comprar gallinas 20 y cuyes 50, la socia invertir en la compra de estos animales menores y los criara, engordara y espera que se reproduzcan antes de venderlos. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de gallinas y cuyes. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Martha, 56, is a member of the Las Flores de Yanacona communal bank located ten minutes from the town of Urubamba belonging to Cusco Department.
She is married and has four children who are all independent. Shes a farmer and also raises small farm animals. She raises guinea pigs, chickens and pigs that she fattens up and then sells. She sells her small farm animals at the Urubamba market. She wants the loan to buy 20 chicks and 50 guinea pigs. She will invest in the purchase of these small animals and shell raise them, fatten them up and hopes that theyll breed before she sells them. She is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of chickens and guinea pigs.
She is grateful for and values the loan granted and commits to continue to make her monthly installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to buy chickens and guinea pigs.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy herbicides for infestations, and manure.

loan.name: Olivia

texts.es: La seora Olivia, se dedica a la produccin de leche y tambin trabaja realizando artesanas pues es tejedora de mantas. El crdito lo requiere para la comprar un par de vacas lecheras y as podr aumentar la produccin de leche y obviamente sus ingresos. Vive en casa propia ubicado en la localidad de Achacachi del departamento de La Paz; es soltera y no tiene hijos. Esta es la segunda vez que su crdito ser enviado a Kiva para fondeo.
texts.en: Olivia is a dairy farmer and also works making crafts since shes a blanket weaver. She needs the loan to buy a pair of dairy cows to increase milk production and, obviously, her income. She lives in her own house located in Achacachi in La Paz Department. Shes single and has no children. This is the second time her loan will be sent to Kiva for funding.

loan.use: to buy a pair of daily cows.

loan.name: Adriel

texts.es: Adriel, de 63 aos, es un hombre muy alegre y responsable, l convive con su pareja con quien tiene siete hijos mayores, quienes ya son adultos e independientes. Juntos habitan en la casa que hered de sus padres, acompaadps de sus hermanos. El trabajo de Adriel, es el de servicio de vulcanizado a las mototaxis y motos que a diario van en busca que les de solucin los problemas de su llanta. Por otro lado tiene una pequea tienda de venta respetos de vehculos. Ambos negocios se encuentran instalados en un espacio de su casa, y tiene 20 aos ejecutando haciendo lo mismo y con ello logr educar y alimentar a sus hijos, y dos de ellos con este mismo trabajo pero en distintos lugares. La ventaja que tiene su negocio es que su taller se encuentra en un calle muy concurrida de la ciudad. Este ser el primer crdito con MFP, y espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar trabajando en su taller. Con el monto solicitado, comprar repuestos para la venta de algunos materiales y repuestos para implementar su taller.
texts.en:
Adriel, 63, is a very cheerful, responsible man. He lives with his spouse and has six older children who are all adults and independent. They live together in a house he inherited from his parents with his siblings.
Ariels work is repairing mototaxi and motorcycle tires for customers who daily come by seeking solutions to their tire related problems. On the other hand, he also has a small vehicle spare parts store. Both businesses are located in a space in his house. He has been doing the same thing for 20 years and he managed to educate and feed his children through it; two of them have the same kind of business but in other parts of town. The advantage that his shop has is that its located on a very busy street in the city.
This will be his first MFP loan and he hopes to get support from each one of you to stay in business in his shop. He will use the requested amount to by replacement parts to sell and some materials and spare parts to stock his workshop.

loan.use: to buy materials and spare parts.

loan.name: Abesamihigo B Group

texts.fr:
Athanase fait partie du groupe Abesamihigo B. Le nom du groupe signifie performers . Il a 51 ans. Il est mari avec 8 enfants de 6 26 ans, dont 4 scolariss. Son niveau dducation est 6 ans de primaire.
Athanase est cultivateur de riz. Cest son premier cycle de prt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crdit afin dacheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz.
Dans les prochaines annes, Athanase voudrait tre le meilleur agriculteur dans sa valle. Avec les profits, il prvoit dduquer ses enfants et payer la mutuelle de sant.
texts.en: Athanase is part of the Abesamihigo B group. The name of the group means "performers". Athanase is 51 years old, married and has 8 children aged between 6 and 26 years, 4 of whom go to school. Athanase himself completed 6 years of primary school and is a rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB and he will use the money to buy chemical fertilizer for his rice farm. In the coming years, Athanase would like to become the best farmer in his valley. He plans to use his profits to pay his children's educational expenses and his family's health insurance.

loan.use: to buy chemical fertilizer for his rice farm.

loan.name: Patricio

texts.es: El seor Patricio es chofer y tiene dos taxis, pero el est a cargo de uno y para el otro contrata un chofer auxiliar. El crdito lo requiere para el mantenimiento de las movilidades y comprar una batera para el vehiculo que maneja el chofer contratado. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Villa Ingenio de la ciudad de El Alto; Patricio es casado y tiene tres hijos. Patricio ya solicit dos crditos anteriores a travs de Kiva y est ser la tercera vez.
texts.en:
Sr. Patricio is a taxi driver and owns two vehicles. He drives one taxi while the other one is driven by a hired assistant. The loan he is requesting will be used for the maintenance of both vehicles and the purchase of a battery for his assistants taxi. Patricio lives in his own home in the District of Villa Ingenio in the city of El Alto. He is married and has three children.

Patricio has already requested two previous loans through Kiva and this will be his third one.

loan.use: to pay for the maintenance of two taxis and to buy a battery for one of them.

loan.name: Aleida

texts.es: Aleida tiene 33 aos, es una mujer alegre, dinmica y emprendedora, esta casada y tiene dos hijos de 10 y 7 aos. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, acompaada tambin de su suegro, motivo por el cual ella y su esposo se esfuerzan cada da para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Aleida consiste en la venta de ropa, zapatos y productos para el hogar por medio de catlogo. Aleida posee un loca en la casa de su madre, ah comparte el local junto a su hermana que se dedica a otro negocio, es as que lleva trabajando por ms de seis aos y lo hace sola. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene disponibilidad para muchas otras actividades adems de tener contacto directo con la gente, pues ella es muy sociable, y le encanta ofrecer los artculos y accesorios de moda, as como la prendas de vestir de temporada, logrando captar ms clientela. Su mayor anhleo es tener una boutique, pero para ello necesitar invertir y crecer su negocio. Este ser el tercer crdito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprar ropa, zapatos y algunos accesorios para abastecer su pequeo negocio.
texts.en: Aleida is 33 years old. She is a cheerful, dynamic and enterprising woman. She is married and has two childrem aged 10 and 7. Together they live in their own home with her father in law. Her husband and her work hard every day to offer them a good quality of life. Aleida's job consists of selling clothes, shoes and products for the home via catalogue. She has a locale in her mother's house. She shares the locale with her sister who has another business. She has been doing this work for more than six years and she works alone. What she likes the most about her job is she is available to do many other activities and she has direct contact with people. She is very sociable and she likes to offer fashion items and accessories as well as seasonal clothing, in order to gain more customers. Her greatest wish is to have a boutique store, but she will need to invest and make her business grow. This will be her third loan with MFP and she hopes to have your support to keep on working. With the amount she has asked for, she will buy clothes, shoes and some accessories for inventory for her small business.

loan.use: to buy clothes, shoes and accessories.

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: Samuel

texts.es: El sr. Samuel nacido en la ciudad de Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Ahora vive en una localidad a 32km de el Torno al en la comunidad de las Liras, su esposa la Sra. Cristina es ama de casa, tienen dos hijos, ellos viven y trabajan en su misma parcela, ellos se dedican a la agricultura, siembran arroz, maz y tambin se dedican a sacar madera para los carpinteros, solicitaron un crdito para la compra de una motocicleta, por motivo que no hay transporte hasta su parcela y esto le dificulta al Sr. Samuel movilizarse a distintos lugares, por este motivo solicito el crdito ya que una motocicleta le ser de mucha utilidad, los productos que siembran lo comercializan en el mercados de el Torno directamente del productor al consumidor, donde les va muy bien ya que tiene mucha clientela, es una persona trabajadora con muchas ganas de seguir adelante, agradecido con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Samuel was born in the city of Santa Cruz de la Sierra. Now he lives 32 kilometers from el Torno in the community of Las Liras. His wife Cristina is a homemaker and they have two children, who live and work on the same plot of land. They work in agriculture, planting rice and corn and they also cut wood for the carpenters. They requested this loan in order to purchase a motorcycle, since there isn't transportation to his property and this makes it difficult for Samuel to travel to different places. For this reason, he requested the loan since a motorcycle would be very useful to him. He sells the produce that they plant in the markets of el Torno, directly from producer to consumer, where it is going well since he has many customers. He is a hardworking person with a great desire to succeed and grateful to the institution for the support being offered.

loan.use: to purchase a motorcycle

loan.name: Jesus

texts.es: El seor Jess, es comerciante de cabezas de llamas y tambin es maestro curandero, es decir que cura a la gente usando hierbas medicinales. El crdito lo requiere para la compra de ms llamas, para luego vender su carne y las cabezas a los mercados donde se cocinan y se hacen comidas con carne de llama, que por ciento es muy apetecida y ms saludable que la carne de res. Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Pasankeri en la ciudad de La Paz, es viudo y tiene cinco hijos. Jess es cliente de IMPRO desde el ao 2008 y esta ser la segunda vez que su solicitud de crdito sea canalizada a travs de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Jess sells llama heads and is also a master practitioner of folk medicine. He says that he can cure people through the use of medicinal herbs. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy more llamas so that he can eventually sell the meat and the heads at the markets where dishes using these ingredients are prepared. Llama meat is known for being more appealing and healthier than beef. Jess lives in his own home in the District of Pasankeri in the city of La Paz. He is a widower and has five children.

Jess has been a client of IMPRO since 2008. This is the second time that his loan request has been referred to Kiva for funding.

loan.use: to purchase llamas to raise and for eventual resale.

loan.name: Angel Mara

texts.es:
ngel es un microempresario padre de 5 hijos que vive en la provincia ecuatoriana de "Chimborazo" en una parroquia de la capital de esta provincia que se llamada "Eloy Alfaro". Este sector es conocido por sus deliciosos helados llamados "helados de Salcedo". Este ecuatoriano fue presidente del barrio donde reside con su familia y gracias a su gestin se realizaron obras importantes para el bienestar de varias familias.
Desde hace 12 aos ngel fabrica y vende helados en este sector. Al principio fue difcil por la falta de dinero emprender su propio negocio pero hoy en da todos lo conocen por vender un producto de calidad. Durante los primeros meses de su negocio el nicamente comercializaba los helados pero luego se arriesg a fabricarlos. l quiere pagar su carro, el cual le ayuda a distribuir sus helados y as vender ms como nos comenta. Es su primer crdito con Fundacin Alternativa y se espera que ngel cumpla sus metas.
texts.en:
ngel is a micro-entrepreneur and the father of five children. He lives in the parish of Eloy Alfaro, which is the capital of Chimborazo Province. This area is known for its delicious ice cream treats called helados de Salcedo, which are named after an Ecuadorian who served as the president of the neighborhood where ngel resides with his family. The Salcedo administration engaged in important work that promoted the welfare of many families.

ngel has been making and selling ice cream in this area for 12 years. His difficulty at first was the lack of money to start his business, but today everyone knows him because he sells a quality product. During the first few months of his business, he only sold ice cream but he eventually started making it himself. ngel says he wants to pay the costs of his car since it helps him distribute his ice cream so that he can sell more. This is his first loan with Fundacin Alternativa and he hopes to accomplish his goals.

loan.use: to pay the cost of maintaining the car he uses for distributing ice cream.

loan.name: Evaristo

texts.es: El Sr. Evaristo es cliente de la institucin que desde muy joven, radica en Santa Cruz, es oriundo de la ciudad de La Paz, se vino ha trabajar a Santa Cruz buscando un futuro mejor y mejores condiciones de vida, empez comercializando bolsas de plsticos, seguidamente comercializo abarrotes. Fundo una asociacin en uno de los mercados mas populares de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, donde comercializa ropa interior desde hace 18 aos. El cliente menciona que se encuentra satisfecho por los logros obtenidos. La familia la componen 4 hijos y su esposa, los hijos actualmente estudian. El crdito que solicita es para la compra de mercadera, ropa interior por mayor, es una persona muy amable y cordial con sus clientes, se encuentra agradecido con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sr. Evaristo has been a client of Emprender since he moved to Santa Cruz as a young man. He is originally from the city of La Paz, but came to work in Santa Cruz so that he could find a better life and improved living conditions. Evaristo started out selling plastic bags and then transitioned to selling groceries. He started an association at one of the most popular markets in Santa Cruz, where he has been selling undergarments for 18 years. Evaristo says that he is satisfied with what he has achieved. His family consists of his wife and four children who are currently in school.
The loan he is requesting will be used to buy more merchandise, particularly undergarments in bulk. He is a person who is friendly and cordial with his customers. Evaristo is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loan.use: to purchase undergarments in bulk.

loan.name: Samba

texts.fr: Monsieur Samba habite au Sngal. Il est mari et pre de 5 enfants dont lge varie entre 4 mois et 14 ans. Il volue depuis plus de 10 ans dans le secteur du commerce et sadonne la vente de denres alimentaires et produits agro-alimentaires. Il a choisi son activit par amour en aidant son oncle qui voluait dans ce domaine. Il est membre dun des guichets de lU-IMCEC depuis octobre 2010. Il sollicite un crdit de 200 000 frs prvu pour lachat de denres alimentaires destins a renforcer son stock de produits , dlargir son activit, daccroitre ses bnfices, et de satisfaire ses besoins familiaux.
texts.en: Samba lives in Senegal. He is married and the father of 5 children aged between 4 months and 14 years. He has been active in the retail sector for over a decade and sells staple and agricultural food products. He loves his line of work, which he chose after helping his uncle with his retailing activities. He has been a member of a UIMCEC branch since October 2010. He is requesting a loan of 200 000 francs so that he can restock on food products, expand his business activities and increase his profits, which he plans to use to satisfy his family's needs.

loan.use: to buy food products for resale.

loan.name: Dufatanye Duterimbere / Rsz Group

texts.fr:
Jean fait partie du groupe Dufatanye Duterimbere / RSZ. Le nom du groupe signifie travailler ensemble pour le dveloppement . Il est n au Rwanda et il a 49 ans. Il est mari avec 6 enfants de 9 24 ans, dont 6 scolariss. Son niveau dducation est 6 ans de primaire.
Jean est cultivateur de riz. Cest son deuxime cycle de prt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crdit afin dacheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz.
Sa stratgie pour la croissance de son business est de cultiver temps pour avoir une bonne rcolte. Dans les prochaines annes, Jean voudrait tre le meilleur agriculteur de riz dans sa valle. Avec les profits, il prvoit dduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en: Jean is part of the Dufatanye Duterimbere / RSZ group. The name of the group means "working together for development". Jean was born in Rwanda and is 49 years old. He is married and has 6 children aged between 9 and 24 years, all of whom go to school. He himself completed 6 years of primary school. Jean is a rice farmer. This is his second loan cycle with ACB and he will use the money to buy chemical fertilizer for his rice farm. He plans to grow his business by using seasonal farming techniques to ensure a good harvest. In the coming years, Jean would like to become the best rice farmer is his valley, and he plans to use his profits to educate and take care of his children.

loan.use: to buy chemical fertilizer for his rice farm.

loan.name: Moises Tony

texts.es: El seor Moiss oriundo de Pocitos-Tarija, tiene tres hijos, su esposa falleci hace tres meses, este fue un golpe para el comenta el Sr. ya que se siente muy solo y sin ayuda ya que ella era la que se encargaba del cuidado de sus hijos, pero por ellos el Sr. sigue adelante luchando, Su domicilio es propio que se encuentra ubicado en barrio lindo (municipio la guardia), es de ocupacin taxista, trabaja con los trufis de la ramada y urbanizacin Arco iris, hace unos dos aos que se dedica a esta actividad. Es cliente antiguo. El destino del crdito es para el mantenimiento de su vehculo necesita reparar su motor de su auto, ya que este desperfecto en su movilidad no le permite realizar un buen trabajo. Se siente agradecido con la institucin por el apoyo que se le ha brindado.
texts.en:
Sr. Moiss is a native of Pocitos-Tarija and has three children. His wife died three months ago. Moiss says that this was a devastating blow for him because he feels alone and helpless. His wife was responsible for taking care of the children, but he is determined to press forward for their sake. He owns a home in the neighborhood of Lindo in the town of La Guardia. Moiss is a taxi driver and works an assigned route from La Ramada to the urban development of Arco Iris. He has been in this profession for about two years.

Moiss is a long-time client. This loan will be used to maintain his vehicle since the engine needs to be repaired. This defect with his vehicle is not allowing him to perform a good job. He is grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loan.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance.

loan.name: Buen Corazon Group

texts.es:
La A.C. BUEN CORAZN iniciar su quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Villa Exaltacin, est compuesta por trece integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Virginia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Comercio, venta de ropa, servicios de comida y produccin.
La seora Virginia indica que hace dos aos que integra Pro Mujer por invitacin de la promocin y de sus vecinas. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de ropa que viene trabajando desde hace diez aos, el mismo lo aprendi de su suegra y de su cuada.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su mercadera (compra de ropa), que adquirir de Oruro o de la Huyustus y lo comercializa en las ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en unin libre y tiene y tiene tres hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las reuniones.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Buen Corazn (Good Heart) is starting its fifth loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Villa Exaltacin Center. The group consists of 13 members and is led by a Board of Directors headed by Sra. Virginia. The members of the Communal Bank engage in various businesses to get ahead such as trade, clothing sales, food services, and manufacturing.

Sra. Virginia says that she joined Pro Mujer two years ago after receiving an invitation to attend a promotion from her neighbors. She currently has a business selling clothes and has worked for 10 years. She learned this trade from her mother-in-law and sister-in-law.

The loan she is receiving now will be used to increase her inventory of merchandise (by purchasing clothes). She acquires her goods from Oruro or La Huyustus and then sells them at the fairs. Working in this manner makes it possible for her to generate income to support her family. Virginia is in a common-law relationship and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Virginia said that she enjoys the meetings.

loan.use: to buy clothing.

loan.name: Aura Lila

texts.es: Doa Aura es de profesion costurera, con mas de treinta aos, laborando para el bienestar comun de su familia, es de condicion sencilla y poco a poco ha venido haciendo mejora a su casa. Cuenta con la ayuda economica de sus hijos, lo que para ella es de gran sastifaccion. Los prestamos en Afodenic, han sido para las mejora a su vivienda con el credito anterior logro hacer un cuarto en la parte de atrs de concreto y madera. Hoy con este nuevo financiamiento mejorara la cocina que esta en muy mal estado ya que las tablas estan bastante vieja, lo que levantara desde el aranque para que quede buena,comprara materiales en tabla de madera, clavos, cuartones y otros, logrando estar en mejores condiciones de vivienda.
texts.en:
Doa Aura is a seamstress by profession. She has been working for more than 30 years in order to provide for the common welfare of her family. Her living conditions are simple, but slowly she has been making improvements to her home.

Aura has the financial assistance of her children, which gives her great satisfaction. The loans from AFODENIC have been used for home improvements. With her previous loan, she was able to add a room at the back of her house by purchasing concrete and wood.

Today she will use her new loan to make improvements to her kitchen, which is in very bad shape. The floorboards are quite old and need to be pulled up in order to start from scratch. Aura will buy materials such as wooden planks, nails, lumber, and other supplies so that she can improve the condition of her home.

loan.use: to purchase construction materials for making improvements to her kitchen.

loan.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal LAS FLORES DE YANACONA; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco. La socia Ana Maria; tiene 58 aos de edad, es soltera, tiene 2 hijos de 23, 14 aos de edad; La socia se dedica a la agricultura, la socia y vende lo que produce, la socia vende en el mercado de Urubamba verduras, ella lleva a vender los das sbados y domingos, la socia desea el crdito para invertir en la compra de semillas, la socia tambin requiere contrata un tractos y preparar el terreno para la nueva siembra, la socia invertir tambin en la compra de abono para luego ponga al cultivo. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas y de abono. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Ana Maria is a member of the Communal Bank Las Flores de Yanacona (The Flowers of Yanacona), which is situated 10 minutes away from the village of Urubamba in the Department of Cusco.

She is 58 years old, single, and has two children (ages 23 and 14). Ana Maria is a farmer who sells what she produces at the vegetable market in Urubamba on Saturdays and Sundays. She wants a loan to invest in the purchase of seeds. Ana Maria will also rent a tractor so that she can prepare her land for a new planting season. In addition, she will also purchase compost that she will eventually apply on her crops. Therefore, she is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of seeds and compost.

Ana Maria appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, she promises to complete her monthly payments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and compost.

loan.name: Zenovia Narcisa

texts.es: La Sra. Zenovia se dedica desde hace 15 aos a la comercializacin de bazar y librera en uno de los mercados mas concurridos de la ciudad de Santa cruz. Ella empez trayendo material de librera y reparta a las tiendas, despus fue surtiendo con bazar, actualmente tiene su puesto fijo en el mercado donde le va muy bien ya que tiene mucha clientela, tambin entrega material de escritorio al por mayor, La familia consta de su hijo y esposo. El crdito que se va ha financiar es para capital de trabajo ya que desea comprar material de escritorio y juegos didcticos para esta poca de fin de ao. Tiene experiencia en crditos ya que constantemente saca para capital de trabajo. Fruto de su esfuerzo es que ya cuenta con su casa propia y se siente muy orgullos a de ello, es una persona muy emprendedora con ganas de superacin agradecida con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
For the past 15 years, Sra. Zenovia has managed a bazaar and bookstore at one of the most well known bookstores in Santa Cruz. She started out bringing bookstore materials and distributing them to the stores. Afterwards, she stocked up on merchandise for her bazaar. Now she has an established location in the market that is doing well because she has many customers. Zenovia also sells writing supplies in bulk. Her family consists of her husband and son.
The loan she is requesting will be used to finance her operating capital. She wants to buy writing supplies and educational games for the end of the year. Zenovia has experience with loans since she is constanting using them for her operating capital. The results from her efforts include being able to build her own home, of which she is very proud. Zenovia is an enterprising individual who has the will to succeed. She thanks Emprender for the support it has provided.

loan.use: to buy writing supplies and educational games.

loan.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal LAS FLORES DE YANACONA; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco. La socia Luz Marina; tiene 38 aos de edad, es conviviente, tiene 4 hijos de21, 17, 12, 11 aos de edad; La socia se dedica a la agricultura, la socia tiene sus cultivos de maz y hortalizas, la socia tambin siembra cebada, todo lo que ella produce lo lleva a vender, la socia vende en el mercado de Urubamba verduras, ella lleva a vender los das sbados y domingos, la socia desea el crdito para invertir en la compra de semillas, la socia tambin requiere contrata un tractos y preparar el terreno para la nueva siembra, la socia invertir tambin en la compra de abono para luego ponga al cultivo. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas y de abono. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is a member of the Communal Bank Las Flores de Yanacona (The Flowers of Yanacona), which is situated 10 minutes away from the village of Urubamba in the Department of Cusco.

She is 38 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has four children (ages 21, 17, 12, and 11). Luz Marina is a farmer who grows corn and vegetables, as well as barley. She sells everything she produces at the vegetable market in Urubamba on Saturdays and Sundays. Luz Marina wants a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of seeds. She will also rent a tractor so that she can prepare her land for a new planting season. In addition, she will also purchase compost that she will eventually apply on her crops. Therefore, she is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of seeds and compost.

Luz Marina appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, she promises to complete her monthly payments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and compost.

loan.name: Marieme

texts.fr: Madame Marieme est une jeune femme marie de 21 ans. Elle gre un local dans un march de la localit ou elle vit. Elle volue dans le secteur de la restauration et vend petit djeuner, djeuner et diner. Paralllement elle commercialise des habits unisexe quelle place a ses clients. Elle a choisi son activit de commerce dans le souci de ne pas rester dpendante, mais aussi par amour du mtier. Le moment le plus favorables a son activit est la priode dt ou son activit lui gnre le maximum de bnfices.Elle est membre d'un des guichets de l'U-IMCEC depuis 11 ans . Elle sollicite un crdit de 200 000 frs prvu pour lachat de denres alimentaires qui lui permettent de cuisiner les plats quelle sert dans son restaurant. Laugmentation de ses revenus laide couvrir ses dpenses personnelles et a assurer les frais de scolarit de sa fille.
texts.en: Marieme is a young, married woman of 21 years. She is active in the catering industry and runs a restaurant in her local market, where she serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. She also markets and sells unisex clothes to her customers. She started in this line of work to ensure her financial independence, and because of her affinity for retail. She does the most business during the summer months. Marieme has been a member of a UIMCEC branch for 11 years and is requesting a loan of 200 000 francs to buy the ingredients needed for the meals she serves in her restaurant. She will use her increased income to cover her personal expenses and the educational expenses of her daughter.

loan.use: to buy the ingredients for the meals she prepares in her restaurant.

loan.name: Reveca Severiana

texts.es: La Sra. Reveca se dedica desde hace 10 aos a la comercializacin de juguetes. Ella empez trayendo juguetes desde la ciudad de La Paz y dejando en los mercados de Santa Cruz al por mayor, actualmente tiene su puesto fijo en el mercado donde le va muy bien ya que tiene mucha clientela, tambin entrega juguetes al por mayor, La familia consta de su hijo y esposo. El crdito que se va ha financiar es para capital de trabajo ya que desea comprar juguetes para esta poca de fin de ao ya que se acercan las fiestas navideas. Tiene experiencia en crditos ya que constantemente saca para capital de trabajo, es una persona muy emprendedora con ganas de superacin agradecida con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mrs. Reveca has sold toys for ten years. She started bringing toys from the city of La Paz and selling them wholesale in the markets of Santa Cruz. She now has her own stall in a market. It is going very well for her and she has many customers. She also sells toys wholesale. Her family is made up of her son and her husband. Her loan is for working capital. She wants to buy toys for the end of the year season, since the Christmas holidays are coming up. She has experience with loans because she is always taking them out for working capital. She is a very enterprising person with a desire to get ahead. She is grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loan.use: to buy toys wholesale.

loan.name: Abajyamugambi Zone 2 Group

texts.fr:
J. fait partie du groupe Abajyamugambi Zone 2 et le chef du groupe c'est celui qui a de l'argent. Le nom du groupe signifie les initiateurs . Il a 25 ans et il est clibataire. Son niveau dducation est 6 ans de primaire.
J. est cultivateur de riz. Cest son premier cycle de prt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crdit afin dacheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz.
Sa stratgie pour la croissance de son business est la semence du riz slectionn. Dans les prochaines annes, J. voudrait rcolter une grande quantit de riz. Avec les profits, il prvoit daider ses parents.
texts.en:
J. is a member of the group Abajyamugambi Zone 2. He is also the group leader, as seen in the photo. The group's name means "the initiators". J. is 25 years old and single. He attended six years of primary school.
J. is rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He will use the funding to buy fertilizer for his rice growing activity.
His business growth strategy revolves around the selected rice seed. In the coming years, J. hopes to produce a large crop of rice and use the profits to help his parents.

loan.use: to buy fertilizers for his rice farming business

loan.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos tiene 35 aos, es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable, convive con su pareja, con quien tiene dos hijos de 6 aos y un ao y medio. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, junto a su esposa y su madre. l trabajo al que se dedica es el transporte de pasajeros, servicio que lo realiza dentro de la ciudad. Su trabajo empieza desde muy temprano para salir en busca de pasajeros quienes la mayora son comerciantes y deben dirigirse a su puesto de venta desde muy temprano. Tiene 9 aos en este trabajo y an desea continuar, ya que gracias a ello, le dio la oportunidad de crecer y darle lo mejor a su familia. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo, es que tiene disponibilidad de poder dejar a su hijo en el jardn y recogerlo, adems puede realizar otras actividades, como el de acondicionar los espacios de casa, en ellas habitaciones que deja en alquiler. Este ser el primer crdito con MFP, y por ello espera la ayuda de cada uno de ustedes para pueda incurisonar en otro trabajo que le gener ms rentas. Con ste ltimo crdito podr comprar pollitos, vacunas, alimentos y materiales para iniciar con la crianza de pollos.
texts.en: Carlos is 35. He is a very hard-working and responsible man. He lives with his wife, with whom he has two children ages 6 and 1. They live together in their own home with his mother. Carlos transports passengers in the city. He starts working very early in order to go find passengers, the majority of whom are merchants whom he drives to their stalls starting very early in the morning. He has done this work for nine years and wants to continue, because this job has given him the opportunity to grow and give his family the best. What he likes about his job is being able to be available to drop off and pick up his child from nursery school, and being able to do other activities, such as doing work on their home. He wants to rent out some rooms. This will be his first loan with MFP, and he hopes for the help of every one of you in order to start a new line of work and generate more income. With this loan he will purchase baby chicks, vaccines, food and materials to start raising chickens.

loan.use: to buy baby chicks, food, and materials for installing a barn.

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria, tiene la edad 37 de aos, est en unin libre y vive con su esposo e hijos. Ella pretende con el crdito comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal y as obtener de el los mejores resultados. Ella cuenta con el terreno apto y en produccin y lo que pretende es darle una mejora y as cosechar mayor cantidad de caf. Ella quiere generar las mayores ganancias para su bienestar familiar y ayudarle a su esposo con las obligaciones. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en: Gloria, who is 37 years old, is in a common-law marriage and lives with her husband and children. With this loan she plans to buy the supplies to support her coffee plantation and thus obtain better results from it. She has suitable land that is in production and what she wants is to give it some improvements and thus harvest a greater quantity of coffee. She wants to generate better earnings for the well-being of her family and to help her husband with their obligations. This will be the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has not had any other loans from state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loan.use: to improve her coffee plantation

loan.name: Abishyizehamwe / Rsz Group

texts.fr:
Samuel fait partie du groupe Abishyizehamwe / RSZ et sur la photo c'est celui qui a de l'argent. Le nom du groupe signifie ceux qui sont ensemble . Il a 42 ans. Il est mari avec 5 enfants de 2 25 ans, dont 4 scolariss.
Samuel est cultivateur de riz. Cest son premier cycle de prt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crdit afin dacheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz.
Sa stratgie pour la croissance de son business est la semence du riz slectionn. Dans les prochaines annes, Samuel voudrait rcolter une grande quantit de riz. Avec les profits, il prvoit dduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Samuel is a member of the Abishyizehamwe / RSZ group. In the picture, he is the one holding the money. The name of the group means "those who are together." He is 42 years old. He is married and has five children between the ages of two and 25, four of whom attend school.
Samuel is a rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy chemical fertilizers to use in cultivating his rice.
His strategy for growing his business is to use only select rice for sowing. In the coming years, Samuel would like to harvest a large quantity of rice. With his profits, he plans to educate and care for his children.

loan.use: to buy chemical fertilizers to use in cultivating his rice.

loan.name: Glendy Brislid

texts.es: La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal LAS FLORES DE YANACONA; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco. La socia Glendy; tiene 20 aos de edad, es soltera, tiene 1 hijo; de 2 aos de edad; la socia trabaja en un hostal de turismo, la socia tambin se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como negocio propio, la socia compra gallinas, la socia cra gallinas y aves de corral para la venta a los restaurantes tursticos, la socia desea el crdito para invertir en la compra de 40 gallinas tiernas de doble pechuga. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar gallinas un total de 40. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Las Flores de Yanacona communal bank, situated 10 minutes from the town of Urubamba, Cusco department.
She is Glendy, 20, single, and she has a 1-year old son. She works in a tourist hostel and also has her own business of raising small animals. The member buys hens and raises them and other poultry to sell to tourist restaurants. She would like the loan to buy 40 double breasted young hens. She will use the financing to purchase a total of 40 hens.
Glendy appreciates and values the loan offered her and promises to continue making the monthly payments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to buy a total of 40 hens.

loan.name: Cristina

texts.es: La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal LAS FLORES DE YANACONA; Situado a 10 minutos del mismo poblado de Urubamba, perteneciente al Departamento de Cusco. La socia cristina; tiene 38 aos de edad, es casada, tiene 2 hijos de el menor es de 18 aos; La socia se dedica a la agricultura, la socia se dedica a la siembra y cosecha de papa, maz, y la socia en esta ocasin desea el crdito para invertir en la compra de semillas de maz blanco y papa para sembrar y en el tractoreo para preparar la tierra, tambin comprara el abono para poner luego de sembrar. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de semillas, abono y el pago al tractor. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo otorgado y se compromete a seguir cumpliendo de manera disciplinada el pago de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
This communal bank member belongs to the communal bank "Las Flores de Yanacona" (The Flowers of Yanacona), located 10 minutes from the town of Urubamba, in the department of Cusco.
She is 38 years old and is married. She has two children, of whom the younger is 18. She works in agriculture. She plants and harvests potatoes and corn. Now she wants a loan to invest in the purchase of seeds for white corn and potatoes to plant and in the tractor to prepare the land. She will also buy fertilizer to put down, then she will plant. She is applying for the loan to invest in the purchase of seeds and fertilizer and the payment for the tractor.
She is thankful for and appreciates the loan that is offered to her, and she promises to continue making her monthly payments in a disciplined manner.

loan.use: to invest in the purchase of seeds and fertilizer and make the tractor payment.

loan.name: Carmen Amelia

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 57 aos es casada y tiene dos hijos que tiene 22 y 28 aos, vive con su familia en Cayambe que est+a a una media hora de Otavalo en el norte de Ecuador. Carmen se describe como una persona trabajadora y responsable.
Carmen trabaja con su esposo en la produccin de ladrillos, ya son 4 aos que solicita crditos a Fodemi, el actual crdito es para la compra de lea para la quema de ladrillos lo cual se hace para que el ladrillo se endurezca y su uso sea el ptimo.
Su sueo es que su negocio de la produccin de ladrillos perdure y crezca cada da ms.
texts.en:
Carmen is 57 years old. She is married and has two children who are 22 and 28 years old. She lives with her family in Cayambe, which is half an hour from Otavalo in the north of Ecuado. Carmen describes herself as a hard-working and responsible person.
Carmen works with her husband producing bricks, and has been requesting loans from Fodemi for the last four years. The current loan is for the purchase of firewood for firing the bricks, which is done so that the the brick hardens and becomes optimized for use.
Her dream is for her business to last, and for it to grow more every day.

loan.use: to purchase firewood for her brick kiln.

loan.name: Amado

texts.es: Amado, tiene la edad 65 de aos, est casado y vive con su esposa que es su mayor prioridad. El con el crdito va comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal. El cuenta con el terreno apto y en muy buenas condiciones por lo cual asistir su proyecto para aumentar su cosecha y as obtener los mejores resultados. El pretende con el crdito generar las mayores ganancias para su bienestar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su esposa. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en:
Amado, aged 65, is married and lives with his wife, who is his biggest priority.
With the loan, he will buy supplies to help him with his coffee plantation. He has land that is suitable and in very good condition, which will help in his plan to increase his harvest and so obtain better results. He plans to generate greater earnings with the loan, which will enhance his well-being and provide his wife with a better quality of life.
This is his first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He had not take other loans previously from the state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him the loan with better terms and much lower interest rates.

loan.use: to improve his coffee production.

loan.name: Mykola

texts.en:
Mykola is married and has a 5-month-old daughter. He works as a taxi driver and provides transportation services in Ukraine. After graduating from a university with a geophysicist specialty, Mykola could not find work in his field and decided to work as a taxi driver. He has been in this business for four years. His monthly income is 4000 hryvnia. Besides taxi driver work, Mykola works as a mechanic of fourth class, specializing in operations and repairs of gas equipment at one of the plants in Ivano-Frankivsk. His monthly income there is 1500 hryvnia. Mykola needs a loan in the sum of 9000 hryvnia in order to buy gas equipment and convert his car to run on propane gas because natural gas has gone up in price in recent times. Mykola's business is the only source of income for his family. He hopes that his fueling expenses will drastically decrease after converting his car to run on propane gas, which will in-turn lead to an increased profit.
Note: previously Mykola's vehicle was working on liquefied gas. When he took his previous loan, he used the funds to re-equip his car to run on liquified gas. However, recently the price for liquified gas went up quite a bit, causing Mykola to request a new loan to re-equip his vehicle to run on compressed gas.

loan.use: to purchase gas equipment and convert his car to run on propane gas

loan.name: Anzhela

texts.en: Anzhela is married and has an 18-year-old daughter, Vanessa. Anzhela is involved in selling women's purses and clothing at a department store in her small town of Vinogradovo. Her retail outlet is located right in the center of the department store. Anzhela has been involved in clothing sales for nine years. Her merchandise is currently valued at 75000 hryvnia, and her income is 7000 hryvnia. Anzhela plans to use the loan in the sum of 18000 hryvnia to buy 20 purses and 30 sets of women's clothing. She would be able to increase her merchandise quantity and business income. Anzhela plans to invest the resulting profits into developing her business and opening another retail outlet in the near future.

loan.use: to purchase 20 purses and 30 sets of women's clothing

loan.name: Ana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia Ana ; es casada y tiene 35 aos de edad; la socia es natural de Yuncaypata, la socia tiene 6 hijos; de 17, 15, 12, 8, 5 aos de edad; la socia se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de vacas y animales menores como chanchos, cuyes, aves de corral, la socia lleva a vender sus productos a uno de los mercados en la ciudad de Cusco, ella vende tarwi, trigo, papa, alverja, cebada. La socia desea seguir trabajando en lo que conoce, por lo que en esta ocasin desea el crdito para la compra de semillas para sembrar y mientras espera la cosecha ella trabaja con sus animales menores con la compra crianza reproduccin y venta final. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para sembrar papa, cebada, trigo.
La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
Ana belongs to the Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata Bank. This friendly bank is located 30 minutes from Cusco in the town of Yuncaypata. It is a typical small town that preserves its Andean heritage. The whole community supports each other whether by helping out during planting and harvesting time, caring for children, or watching over animals. It is a beautiful Quechua-speaking town in the department of Cusco.
Ana is 35 years old and married with six children, ages 17, 15, 12, 8, 5 respectively. She was born and raised in Yuncaypata. Ana works in agriculture and raises livestock including cows, pigs, guinea bigs, and chickens. She sells her products at the market in Cusco. She sells tarwi (an Andean bean), wheat, peas,potatoes, and barley. She hopes to continue working in the area where she has expertise. She will use the loan to purchase potato, barley, and wheat seeds to sow, and while she waits for harvest time she will work caring for her animals, which she purchases, raises, breeds, and then sells.
She appreciates and is thankful for the loan made available by this medium. She pledges to be disciplined in making her payments just as she has been with her previous loans.

loan.use: to purchase potato, barley, and wheat seeds.

loan.name: Ubaldina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Ubaldina; la socia tiene 36 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 7 hijos el ltimo de sus hijos tiene 2 aos y medio de edad, la socia trabaja en agricultura y en comercio minorista, la socia vende verduras, la socia trabaja con sus hija mayor vendiendo en un mercado en Cusco llevando a vender todo tipo de verduras, la socia tambin tiene chanchos, vacas, pollos doble pechuga y el crdito lo invertir en la agricultura ella sembrara verduras esta poca y con parte del dinero comprara vitaminas para sus pollos. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas de verduras y la compra de vitaminas para los pollos doble pechuga. La fotografia tomada ala socia corresponde a el dia de la reunion en grupo estan reunidos en la iglesia de su comunidad, la socia esta en la comision de elaboracion de comidas junto a otras dos socias que realizan cada reunion una actividad y preparan diversos potajes para su grupo.
La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata bank, which is a very pleasant institution. It's located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco in a village called Yuncaypata. The village is typical in the way it preserves its pure Andean heritage, and everyone in the community helps each other during the planting and harvesting seasons by caring for children and animals. It's a very pretty, Quechua-speaking village in department of Cusco.
Ubaldina is 36 years old, is married, and has seven children, the youngest of whom is 2 1/2 years old. Ubaldina works in agriculture and retail trade. With her oldest daughter she sells vegetables in a Cusco market, taking all types of vegetables to sell. Ubaldina also has pigs, cows, and double breasted chickens.
She will use her loan to invest in agriculture. She will plant vegetables this time of year, and with part of the money buy vitamins for her chickens. She is asking for this loan to purchase vegetable seeds and vitamins for her double breasted chickens.
The member appreciates and values the loan available through this method, and she promises to faithfully fulfill her obligation, as she has with previous loans.

loan.use: to invest in the purchase of vegetable seeds and also vitamins for her double breasted chickens.

loan.name: Cristina

texts.es: Cristina, tiene la edad de 34 aos, est casada y vive con sus hijos y esposo. Ella con el crdito va comprar ms pollos para su posterior venta. Ella cuenta con una pequea granja de pollos de engorde y quiere aumentar la cantidad de pollos a su poder. Ella con el crdito quiere ayudarle a su esposo con las responsabilidades y ofrecerles a sus hijos una mejor estabilidad econmica. Al igual piensa en el futuro de sus hijos y quieren poder seguir brindarles sus estudios para que sean profesionales en el futuro. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en: Cristina is 34 years old. She is married and lives with her children and her husband. With the loan, she is going to buy more chickens for later sale. She has a little chicken farm where she fattens them, and she wants to increase the number of chickens in her possession. With the loan, she wants to help her husband with their responsibilities and offer their children greater economic stability. In the same way, she thinks of the future of their children, and they want to be able to continue offering them an education so that they can have careers in the future. This is her first loan from FUDECOSUR. She has not had any previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered her the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loan.use: to buy chickens to fatten.

loan.name: Lyuba

texts.en: Lyuba is a widow. She is from the town of Korolyovo, where she is involved in sales of women's clothing. Lyuba has her own women's clothing store and has no significant competition. She has been involved in sales for 11 years. She has 85000 hryvnia invested in her merchandise and a monthly income of 8000 hryvnia. Lyuba needs a loan in the sum of 18000 hryvnia in order to purchase 40 sets of women's clothing, sell them and, thus, increase her income. Lyuba plans to open another retail outlet in the future and help her son, who recently got married.

loan.use: to purchase 40 sets of women's clothing

loan.name: Karla Estebana

texts.es: Doa Karla de oficio comerciante, ha venido creciendo en su negocio de artesania, pues anteriormente tambien tenia una pulperia la que cerro para dedicarse todo el tiempo a la artesania.
