Lo que ahora viaja al pais de Costa Rica, a comprar materia prima, en adorno, gorras, y la compra de saco para hacer las bolsa para sembrar plantas, el cual ha sido buen negocio, y lo vende al por mayor. Parte de este crecimiento ha sido los financiamiento que ha obtenido con Afodenic en seis ciclos todo para la inversion y parte de la ganancia de la pulperia la invertio en la artesania. El cual le ha generado mejores ventas y mejores ganancias. Logrando asi cumplir sus metas, pagar sus compromisos basicos de su hogar, el apoyo a sus hijos, y asu esposo.
texts.en:
Doa Karla, who is a businesswoman, has been increasing her crafts business, since in the past she also had a grocery store, which she closed so that she could work full time in crafts.
Now she travels to the country of Costa Rica to buy basic materials, decorations, and caps, and to buy bags to use for making bags to put plants in. This has been a good business, and she sells them wholesale.
Part of this growth has been due to the financing that she has obtained in six loan cycles with Afodenic, all of which was invested, and part was from the earnings from the grocery store, which she invested in the crafts business, which has generated better sales and better earnings for her. She is succeeding in meeting her goals -- paying her basic household expenses and helping her children and her husband.

loan.use: to buy various craft items, such as materials to make bags to put plants in and to increase her sales.

loan.name: Asomdwee Odzi Mu Group

texts.en:
Gifty is 36 years old, married, and has two children. She is a hardworking trader, selling smoked fish. Fish is widely used in cooking as one the most common source of protein. It is mostly used in the preparation of soup and sauces. Fresh fish is partially roasted on a fire to obtain smoked fish, which is more flavorful.
Gifty plans to use the loan to purchase cartons of smoked fish in bulk from wholesalers to increase her business. She has been in business for 18 years and hopes to expand her business to meet her customers demands. One of her dreams is to own a shed in the community market and to see her children reach higher levels of education.
Gifty is the leader of a trust bank group called Asomdwie odzi mu, which means perfect peace. There are seven members in this group who are traders. The group adopted a co-guarantee system to obtain the loan and uses peer pressure and assistance to one another to repay the loan. As the leader of the group, Gifty ensures that the group members attend meetings and make repayments on schedule.

loan.use: to purchase smoked fish in bulk.

loan.name: Sergio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. El socio Sergio es casado y tiene 3 hijos de 24, 22, 11 aos de edad, el socio se dedica a la construccin en el poblado y fuera del pueblo tambin, el socio desea el crdito en esta ocasin para poder comprar herramientas ya que le han robado, el socio desea invertir el crdito en la compra de sus nuevas herramientas para laborar, el socio solicita el prstamo para comprar herramientas como martillo, cincel, badilejos, serruchos, cierras entre otros.
El socio agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA bank. This friendly bank is located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco in the village called Yuncaypata. This is a typical small village, in that it conserves its pure Andean heritage and they live together as a community, helping each other at sowing and harvest times, and looking after each other's children and animals. It is a very pretty village, and they speak the Quechua language. It is in the Department of Cusco.
The member, Sergio, is married and has three children aged 24, 22 and 11. The member works in construction in the village and also outside it. On this occasion, he wants the loan to be able to buy tools, as his were stolen. The member wants to invest the loan in purchasing new tools for his work. He wants the loan to buy tools such as a hammer, chisel, trowels, and different types of saws, among other things.
The member is grateful and appreciates being able to get a loan through these means. He agrees to comply with the terms in a disciplined manner, just as he has done with his previous loans.

loan.use: to buy tools such as hammer, chisel, trowels, and different types of saws, among other things.

loan.name: Dina

texts.es: Dina tiene 30 aos, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, es madre soltera de un nio de dos aos. Juntos habitan en casa de su padre, por quien ella vela por su salud. Su trabajo consiste en la venta de productos de belleza, cuyo productos son ofrecidos por medio de catlogos, en este negocio tiene gran variedad de productos en stock que fue acumulando durante varias campaas y por lo que tambin ofrece a su clientela a un precio mayor que el inicial. Sus principales clientes son sus compaeros de trabajo, pues ella labora en un hospital y ya tiene mucho clientes afianzados que siempre le solicitan una que otra mercadera. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le da tiempo para otras actividades, por tanto espera poder mantener ese ritmo. Este ser el segundo crdito con MFP, y cuenta con el apoyo de ustedes nuevamente para continuar con su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, comprar productos y tenerlos en stock y as puedan sus clientes mayor variedad para escoger.
texts.en: Dina is 30 years old and is a very happy and hard-working woman. She is a single mother of a 2-year-old son. They live in the house of her father, whose health Dina looks after. Her work consists of selling beauty products via catalog. Her business has a wide variety of products in stock that she has accumulated over time and that she offers to her clients at a higher price than her initial cost. Her main customers are her co-workers, since Dina also works at a hospital, and she already has many customers who are always asking her about other merchandise. What she enjoys about her work is that it gives her time for other activities, so she hopes to stay in this routine. This will be her second loan with Kiva partner MFP, and she counts on your renewed support to help her continue with her business. With the loan, she plans to purchase more beauty products to keep in stock so she can offer her customers a wider selection.

loan.use: to purchase beauty products.

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: Gladys

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Gladys; la socia tiene 29 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 7 y 4 aos de edad, la socia trabaja en agricultura y en la crianza de animales menores, la socia cra cuyes, chanchos, ovejas, y tambin vende en el mercado de Cusco cereales como trigo, tarwi, La socia produce en su chacra estos productos y por ahora ella desea el crdito para invertir en la compra de semillas para la nueva siembra e invertir as en el cultivo de cereales. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para la nueva siembra. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en: Gladys belongs to the "Virgen Del Carmen De Yuncaypata" community bank located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco in a village called Yuncaypata. This is a typical village that maintains all of its pure Andean culture, and the entire community supports each other during the planting and harvest seasons, caring for children and animals. This is a beautiful place where Quechua is spoken, and it's located in the department of Cusco. Gladys is 29 years old. She is married and has two children, ages 7 and 4. She works in agriculture and raising small animals like guinea pigs, pigs and sheep, and she also sells grains like wheat and tarwi (a local grain) at a market in Cusco. She grows these products on her farm, and she is requesting the loan to purchase of seeds for the new planting season and in this way invest in her grain crops. Gladys is grateful and values loans through this medium, and she promises to be disciplined with her payments, as she has been with her past loans.

loan.use: to purchase seeds for the new planting season.

loan.name: Celfita

texts.es: Celfita tiene 45 aos, es madre de tres hijos de 11, 8 y 3 aos, quiene desea darles una buena educacin y alimentacin. Asimismo es una mujer muy trabajadora. Juntos habitan en casa de sus padres. El trabajo al que se dedica es la venta de ropa, cuya mercadera lo trae de Lima y lo lleva al mercado Bellavista, lugar donde ofrece sus productos de forma ambulante. Tiene ms de tres aos trabajando en este rubro y hasta el momento lo hace sola, pues al separarse de su pareja tuvo que ver la manera de poder conseguir la alimentacin y cubrir los gastos educativosw de sus hijos. Le gusta de su trabajo que tiene tiempo a disposicin para que ella pueda hacer algunas otras actividades, lo que no le gusta es que tiene que caminar mucho para poder vender al menos algo. Ella sabe que tiene que esforzarse mucho y como es perseverante siempre lleva algo para su hogar. Este ser el segundo crdito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continaur trabajando por sus hijos. Con el monto solicitado, comprar mercadera para seguir con su actividad y no dejar de vender.
texts.en: Celfita is 45 years old. She is a mother of three children, ages 11, 8 and 3, for whom she wants to provide nourishment and a good education. She is a very hard-working woman. She and her children live in her parents' home. Celfita makes a living selling clothing, which she brings in from Lima and takes to market in Bellavista to offer to customers. She has more than three years of experience in this job and has done it all by herself, since after she separated from her husband she had to find a way to be able to provide for her children and cover their education. She enjoys her work since it allows her time for some other activities. What she doesn't like is that she has to walk a lot to be able to sell at least something. Celfita knows that she has to work very hard and is always persistent to bring something home. This will be her second loan with Kiva partner MFP, and she is hoping for your support in helping her continue working for her children. With the loan, she plans to purchase merchandise to continue her work and not stop selling.

loan.use: to purchase more clothes to stock her business.

loan.name: Purificacion

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Purificacion; la socia tiene 25 aos de edad, la socia es soltera y tiene 1 hijo de 6 aos de edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura y tambin en artesana la socia compra textiles en Cusco y los lleva a vender al poblado siguiente llamado Corao para vender a los turistas que suelen hacer una parada cuando pasa su carro o lo lleva a Tambomachay que es otro centro arqueolgico y aprovecha que ellos estn libres y les ofrece los textiles. La socia desea el crdito para invertir en la compra de textiles y mayor artesana en la ciudad para subir y venderla, ella es padre y madre para su menor hijo motivo por el cual trabaja arduamente para poder dar todo lo que requiere el cuidado y crianza de un nio. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de artesana en Cusco y subir a Tambomachay y venderlo. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en: Purificacion belongs to the "Virgen Del Carmen De Yuncaypata" community bank located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco in a village called Yuncaypata. This is a typical village that maintains all of its pure Andean culture, and the entire community supports each other during the planting and harvest seasons, caring for children and animals. This is a beautiful place where Quechua is spoken, and it's located in the department of Cusco. Purificacion is 25 years old, single and has a 6-year-old son. She works in agriculture and also in handicrafts, buying textiles in Cusco and then taking them to a village called Corao to sell to tourists who often stop while passing in their car. She also takes items to Tambomachay, an archaeological center, and offers the textiles when the workers are free. She is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of textiles and more crafts in Cusco and then go up and sell them. Purificacion is both mother and father to her young son, who is the motivation for her to work arduously in order to give him everything he needs. She is grateful and values the loan through this medium, and she promises to be disciplined in her payments, as she has been with her past loans.

loan.use: to purchase crafts in Cusco and go up to Tambomachay to sell them.

loan.name: Amigas Unidas Group

texts.es: La Sra. Majella ha sido presidenta de la Alcanca Comunal Amigas Unidas desde que forma parte de ella, y siente que sus compaeras la aprecian por la confianza que le han brindado. Majella tiene 50 aos, es casada y tiene un hijo varn de 20 aos. Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza al por menor almacenando en su casa la mercadera, no necesita colocar un letrero ni hacer publicidad, porque ya es conocida en su zona por su negocio. Los prstamos del grupo los utiliza para mantener su stock de cerveza que es aproximadamente de 10 a 20 cajas. Majella suea con ser distribuidora local, los vecinos ya se lo piden, pero el capital que se requiere para la inversin es grande, as que tiene que esforzarse ms para poder cumplirlo.
texts.en: Majella has been president of the "Amigas Unidas" ("Friends United") Community Bank since it was formed, and she feels her fellow members appreciate the confidence she provides. Majella is 50 years old, married and has a grown son who is 20. She makes a living selling beer and stores the beverages in her home. She doesn't need to have a sign or do advertising since her business is well known in her area. She plans to use the loan to maintain her stock of beer, which is approximately between 10 and 20 cases. Majella dreams of being a local distributor; her neighbors already ask her about it. But the capital required for that investment is large, so she has to work even harder to be able to fulfill it.

loan.use: to purchase cases of beer to sell.

loan.name: Agripina

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Agripina; la socia tiene 45 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 23, 22, 19 aos de edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura y ella produce todo lo referente a cereales y todo esto lo seca para venderlo como granos, la socia trabaja con trueque en algunos productos, ella lleva lo que produce en su pueblo y trae a casa lo que no puede cultivar como la poca de los inkas lleva en una olla de tiesto colmada sus granos de habas, trigo, cebada, entre otros y le dan maz amarillo, blanco, morado y otros productos que no siembran en sus comunidad, la socia vende granos en el mercado de Cusco, la socia viaja todos los sbados a primera hora para vender los granos de habas secas, papa deshidratada, moraya, cebada, trigo. La socia desea invertir el prstamo en la compra de semillas para vender. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata Bank, a nice bank located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco in the town called Yuncaypata. This is a typical little town in which all the pure Andean heritage is preserved and everybody in the community supports each other in the planting and harvesting seasons, taking care of each other's children and animals. It is a very pretty Quechua-speaking town in the department of Cusco.
Agripina, 45, is married and has three children, ages 23, 22, and 19. She works in agriculture and produces everything relating to cereals, which she dries to sell as seeds. She barters for some products, like in the time of the Incas: she takes what she produces in her town and brings home what she cannot grow. She carries an earthenware pot filled with her bean, wheat, barley, and other seeds, and they give her yellow, white, and purple corn and other products that are not grown in her community. She sells seeds in the market in Cusco. She travels there first thing every Saturday morning to sell the seeds of dried beans, dehydrated potato, barley, and wheat.
Agripina wants to use the loan to buy seeds to sell.
She appreciates and values this loan, and is committed to fulfilling her obligation in a disciplined manner, as she has been doing with her previous loans.

loan.use: to buy seeds to sell.

loan.name: Sixta

texts.es: Doa Sixta tiene su negocio de venta de tortillas con mas de diez aos palmiando para el sustento de su familia y apoyo a su esposo. Tambien ha mejorado su vivienda con financiamiento que Afodenic ha dado en diez ciclos, lo que para ella, ha sido de gran sastifaccion al poder salir adelante para el bienestar de su familia. Con este nuevo financiamiento sera para la compra de una mantenedora para la elaboracion de refrescos, helados, hielo y compra de quintales de maiz para seguir con su negocio de tortillas. La compra de la mantenedora es con el objetivo de obtener otros ingresos que ayude a los pagos basicos del hogar. Ya que haveces sale muy ajustada con los pagos y tiene que cubrir sus gastos personales tambien.
texts.en:
Doa Sixta has run a business selling tortillas for more than ten years and uses the income to help her husband support their family. She has used loans from Afodenic to improve the home. It has given her a lot of satisfaction to help her family get ahead in life.
With this new loan she wishes to buy a freezer display case for drinks, ice cream, and ice. She also wishes to buy quintales (a quintal is 100 lbs) of maize flour for her tortilla business. It is hoped that the purchase of the freezer will lead to an increased income to pay for basic household expenses since sometimes Sixta finds it hard to find enough money to pay these bills and cover personal expenses as well.

loan.use: to buy a freezer display case for drinks, ice cream, and ice

loan.name: Anacleta

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Anacleta; la socia tiene 48 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 21, 19, 18 aos de edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura y a la crianza de animales menores, la socia cra ovejas, gallinas, y tiene una pequesima tiendita de venta de algunos productos como gaseosas, arroz, por kilos, azcar, galletas, aceite y una y otra cosa no ms. La socia vende sus animalitos menores en el mercado los das sbados por las maanas, la socia desea el crdito para comprar productos para su pequea tiendita de pocos, ella compra productos al pormenor luego viaja a su comunidad. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de productos para su tienda. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata" communal bank. This charming group is located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco, in a village called Yuncaypata. It is a typical village where they have preserved the pure Andean heritage and live together as a community, supporting one another during the planting and harvest seasons and caring for their children and animals together. It is a lovely, Quechua-speaking village located in the department of Cusco.
This borrower is Ms. Anacleta. She is 48 years old, married, and has three children, ages 21, 19 and 18 years old. She works in agriculture and raises young animals. She raises sheep and chickens. She also has a tiny store where she sells a few products like sodas, rice, sugar, cookies, oil, and just a few other things. She sells her young animals at the market on Saturday mornings.
She would like a loan to buy products for her small store. She buys retail products and then travels with them to her community. She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of products for her store.
Anacleta is grateful for and values the loan she is being offered here. She promises to be disciplined in her repayments, just as she has been with her previous loans.

loan.use: to purchase products for her small store

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to install burglar bars

loan.name: Mara Guadalupe

texts.es:
La seora Mara Guadalupe esta agradecida por su cooperacin en el anterior crdito el cual pudo invertir en su negocio.
Est solicitando un prstamo para comprar ms variedad de mercanca, ya que desea invertir en comprar artculos escolares, que son (cuadernos, lapices, colores, plumas y carpetas, tambin comprar ropa de temporada de inviernos) para estar preparada ya que sus clientes le estn solicitando ya este tipo de mercanca.
Doa Mara Guadalupe planea pagar el crdito con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas del negocio. Ya que su esposo el seor Moiss se encargara de los gastos familiares y escolares de sus dos hijos, con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo como chofer de una camin de carga.
Desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y que su negocio tenga mucha ms mercanca.
texts.en:
Mara Guadalupe is grateful for the assistance of her previous loan, which she was able to invest in her business.
She is requesting a loan to buy a greater variety of merchandise, since she wants to invest in buying school supplies, which are notebooks, pencils, colored pencils, pens, and folders. She also wants to buy winter clothing to be ready for the season, since her customers are already asking her for this type of merchandise.
Mara Guadalupe plans to repay the loan with her profits from her sales in her business, since her husband, Moiss, will take responsibility for the family and school expenses of their two children with the salary he receives from his job as a cargo truck driver.
She hopes to improve the quality of life of her family and she wants her business to have much more merchandise.

loan.use: to buy merchandise such as school products and winter clothes.

loan.name: Angel Obed

texts.es: Angel de 32 aos de edad es soltero, labora en el Residencial Bosques de Juigalpan desde hace 18 meses como Guarda de seguridad. Esta solicitando su 2do credito con el objetivo de seguir mejorando las condiciones de su casa poniendole ceramica para asi brindarle mayor comodidad a su familia. Espera en el futuro seguir acondicionando su vivienda ya que es el patrimonio de su familia.
texts.en: Angel is 32 year old and single. He has worked as a security guard at the Juigalpan Residential Forest for the past 18 months. He is requesting his second loan with the goal of continuing to improve his home by placing down ceramic tile to provide more comfort to his family. He hopes to keep improving his home in the future since it's his family's patrimony.

loan.use: to lay ceramic tile.

loan.name: Clotilde

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Clotilde; la socia tiene 44 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 23, 21, 18, 3 aos de edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura y tambin tiene junto a sus esposo un taxi el cual lo hace trabajar prestando el servicio de taxi, la socia lleva a vender al mercado los das sbados los que produce su terreno que es generalmente papa y verduras, la socia desea el crdito para invertir en la compra de semillas, abono y tractor para su terreno. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para sembrar en su terreno y para comprar abono. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en: Clotilde belongs to the "Virgen Del Carmen De Yuncaypata" Community Bank located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco in a village called Yuncaypata. This typical village maintains its pure Andean heritage, and the entire community supports each other during the planting and harvest seasons, caring for children and animals. This is a very beautiful place where Quechua is spoken, and it's in the department of Cusco, Peru. Clotilde is 44 years old, married and has four children, ages 23, 21, 18 and 3. She works in agriculture and also has a taxi along with husband, who works as a driver. She takes the products her land produces, generally potatoes and vegetables, to market on Saturdays. Clotilde is requesting the loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer and a tractor for her land. She feels grateful and values the loan through this medium, and she promises to be as disciplined with her payments as she has been with her past loans.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loan.name: Epifania

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN D. YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos D. la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca D. siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento D. Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Epifania; la socia tiene 45 aos D. edad, la socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos D. 23, 22, 20, 19 aos D. edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura y tambin tiene animales menores, la socia tiene cuyes, pollos, gallinas, chanchos, ovejas, y la socia viaja a Urubamba a 1 hora y 30 desD. su comunidad llevando verduras en especial asnapa que es un grupo D. especias frescas en las cuales contiene, perejil, culantro, asnapa, organo y estas hierbas dan un riqusimo sabor a los diversos platos a la hora D. cocina, la socia tambin venD. la otra parte al por mayor en la ciudad D. Cusco en otro mercado granD.. La socia desea el prstamo para invertir en la compra D. semillas para la nueva etapa D. sembro, la socia solicita el prstamo para comprar semillas, pagar el tractoreo, y abonar. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en: Epifania belongs to the "Virgen Del Carmen D. Yuncaypata" community bank located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco in a village called Yuncaypata. This typical village maintains its pure Andean heritage, and the entire community supports each other during the planting and harvest seasons, caring for children and animals. It's a very beautiful place where Quechua is spoken, and it's located in the department of Cusco. Epifania is 45, married and has four children, ages 23, 22, 20 and 19. She works in agriculture and also raises small animals like guinea pigs, chickens, pigs and sheep. She travels an hour and a half to Urubamba carrying her vegetable products, especially fresh spices like parsley, cilantro, oregano and other herbs that add rich flavors to food. She sells the other half of her products wholesale in the city of Cusco in another big marketplace. Epifania is requesting the loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer for the new planting season, and to pay for a tractor. She feels grateful and values loans from this medium, and she promises to be as disciplined with her payments as she has been with her past loans.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer for the new planting season, and to pay for a tractor.

loan.name: Jos Francisco

texts.es: El seor Jos Francisco tiene ya ms de siete aos dedicndose a la venta de comida en diferentes partes de la ciudad. Esta solicitando un prstamo para invertir en comprar mas variedad de mercanca que es chicharrones, tostadas con chile, elotes preparados(con queso, mayonesa y chile) y raspados de sabores (helo molido con jarabe de sabores de frutas). Ya que por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para la inversin y no quiere descapitalizar el ingreso del negocio. Planea pagar el crdito con las ganancias que obtiene de las ventas del negocio y que su esposa la seora Nidia se encargara de los gastos familiares y escolares de sus tres pequeos hijos que estn estudiando la primaria. Con el sueldo que recibe de su ingreso que tiene de ventas de productos por medio de los catlogos.
texts.en:
Seor Jos Francisco has already been in the business of selling food in different parts of the city for more than seven years. He is seeking a loan to buy a greater variety of food items: chicharrones (pork crackling); toast with chile; corn served with cheese, mayonnaise, and chile; and raspados (shaved ice mixed with different fruit flavourings).
Currently Jos Francisco doesn't have the money needed for these items, and he doesn't wish to take out any money from the income from his business. He plans to repay the loan with the profits he obtains from sales. His wife Seora Nidia will be responsible for family expenses and school supplies for their three small children who go to primary school. She will use the money she earns from selling merchandise from catalogs.

loan.use: will buy items for his food cart

loan.name: Hilaria

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Hilaria; la socia tiene 41 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 7 hijos de los cuales solo tiene a sus lado a los de 15, 13, 11, 8, 7 aos de edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura y tambin tiene animales menores, la socia tiene cuyes, gallinas, chanchos, ovejas, y la socia se dedica a la venta de cereales, ella produce tarwi, trigo, cebada, habas, y los lleva a vender todos los das sbados al mercado en Cusco, la socia desea el crdito para poder sembrar nuevamente sus productos y venderlos, la socia comprara semilla, pagara el tractor para pasar y remover la tierra, y despus de 1 mes abonara su terreno. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para sembrar y para pagar al tractor, ms la compra de abono. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en: This member belongs to communal bank "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata". This very likeable group is located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco, in a village called Yuncaypata. It is a typical small village which maintains all of its pure Andean heritage. They all live in a community, supporting each other during sowing and harvest season, and taking care of each other's children and animals. It is a beautiful, quechua-speaking village located in the department of Cusco. The member is Hilaria, who is 41 years old. She is married and has seven children, of which only the ones who are 15, 13, 11, 8 and 7 years old are still by her side. The member works in agriculture and also has small animals, such as guinea pigs, chickens, pigs and sheep. She sells cereals that she produces: tarwi (a kind of lupin), wheat, barley, broad beans. She takes them to be sold in the market in Cusco every Saturday. The member wishes to get the loan in order to be able to sow and sell her produce once again. She will purchase seeds, pay for the tractor to prepare and remove the soil and, after one month, she will fertilize her land. The member requests the loan to purchase seeds to sow, to pay for the tractor and also to purchase fertilizer. The member gives thanks and values this loan, and she is committed to repay it in a disciplined manner, as she has done with her previous loans.

loan.use: to purchase seeds to sow, to pay for the tractor and also to purchase fertilizer.

loan.name: Rafaela

texts.es: La Seora Rafaela tiene 63 aos, ella tiene un comedor donD. venD. todo tipo D. comidas, hechas a base D. pescado. El trabajo que realiza es muy sacrificado ya que desD. muy tempranas horas del da ella inicia su jornada laboral para poder preparar sus pescado al costado del ri. Comenta que su local tiene mucha clientela ya que ella se destaca por la amabilidad con que atienD. a sus clientes. Uno D. sus sueos es que sus hijos sigan una carrera universitaria para poder ser profesionales y para que no pasen por las mismas necesidades por las que ella tuvo que pasar. Solicita el credito para la compra D. pescado y agradece a la Fundacin por darle la oportunidad D. acceder a un crdito.
texts.en: Rafaela is 63 years old. She owns a diner specializing in dishes prepared using local fish. Her work is difficult since it requires her to begin preparing her dishes very early. Rafaela has a good customer base thanks to her good customer service. One of her dreams is for her children to attend college and pursue a professional career instead of having to struggle to make a living. She is requesting a loan to buy fish for her business. Rafaela is grateful to Fundacin Paraguaya for providing her with the opportunity to access business loans.

loan.use: comprar pescado para la posterior venta.

loan.name: Our Lady Trust Group

texts.en:
Mercy is a lovely and hardworking woman and a 43-year-old single mother of four children. Mercy lives together with her children in a rented house in Takoradi.

Mercy sells beverages like coffee, tea and milo (sorghum) along with bread and fried eggs for breakfast for the customers in her community. Having been in business for the past five years, Mercy has made quite a number of customers through good customer relations.

Mercy plans to invest her portion of a 2,200 GHS loan from SAT to purchase ingredients in bulk for her operation. She hopes to use more of her savings to construct a more permanent structure for her business.

Mercy is currently the leader of a trust bank group called Our Lady Trust Bank, which is made up of five members. The other members are also engaged in trading activities. In her capacity as group leader Mercy ensures that members attend meetings and submit their repayments.

loan.use: to purchase food ingredients in bulk.

loan.name: Los Helechos Group

texts.es:
La seora Alicia, vive en un lugar bonito, ella es casada con el seor Donaciano y con quien procreo ocho hijos de los cuales cuatro ya estn casado y cuatro estn a su responsabilidad.
Ella solicito el prstamo para invertirlo en la compra de marranos para engordarlo y despus venderlo en la misma localidad, en esta actividad lleva practicando cinco aos y ocho meses en la que comenta que le va bien ya que con ellos a mejorado sus ingresos para su hogar.
Su inspiracin por esta actividad fue para apoyar a su esposo con los ingresos de la casa y as sacar adelante a sus hijos que estn con ella, aun as tambin su esposo trabaja en el campo y vende naranja cuando es la temporada.
Lo que ms desea es que con esta pequea actividad pueda seguir trabajando para que cada da mejore ms sus ingresos y as sacar delante a su familia.
Las personas que integran en el grupo son: el seor Tomas quien invertir el prstamo en la compra de materiales para la elaboracin de block y as tambin se integra la seora Mara Ruth quien invertir el prstamo en la compra de fierros viejos y luego los vender por kilo.
texts.en:
Seora Alicia lives in a pretty area. She is married to Seor Donaciano, with whom she has eight children. Four of them are married, and the other four are still her responsibility.
She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of pigs to fatten and later sell in the same location. She has been practicing this activity for five years and eight months, and comments that it's going very well for her, as it has improved her household income.
Her inspiration for this activity was to be able to help her husband with household income, and so be able to help those children who remain at home to move ahead in life. Her husband works in the fields and sells oranges when they are in season.
What she most desires is to continue working in this small business. With each day that passes, her income improves and so she can move her family ahead in life.
The other people who make up this group are: Seor Tomas, who will invest his loan in purchasing materials for making cinder-blocks, and also Seora Mara Ruth who will invest her loan in the purchase of old iron which she will later sell by the kilo.

loan.use: to pay for the purchase of small pigs to fatten and later sell.

loan.name: Reyna Escorcia

texts.es: Doa Reyna de 31 aos de edad, casada, madre de dos hijos pequeos, su esposo de profesion maestro de obra. Tiene su propio negocio el cual inicio hace varios aos con la venta de tortilla, lo que luego con las ganancias decide invertir en una pulperia en donde lleva dos aos en las ventas, asi como el apoyo que le dio su esposo economicamente. Como objetivo es la mejora a su vivienda pues ha ido poco a poco subiendo las paredes de concreto, ya que hay parte forrada de zinc, y que espera mejorar esta condicion. Es por eso que comenzara con financiamiento en Afodenic destinado para la reparcion del techo que esta en mal estado asi como un pequeo muro en frente de la casa, logrando mejor seguridad para sus pequeos hijos. Materiales a comprar: piedra, arena, cemento, hierro, laminas de zinc y comenzar la obra, que solo por este medio se avanza mas rapido.
texts.en:
Reyna is 31 years old, married, and has two young children. Her husband is a master builder.
She has her own business, which she began several years ago by selling tortillas. She decided to take her earnings and the financial help she received from her husband and reinvest them in a small grocery store, which has been open for business for two years.
Her goal is to improve her home; she has been putting up concrete walls little by little since parts are covered in corrugated iron. She hopes to improve their condition. That is why she is beginning to seek financing with Afodenic for the repair of her roof, which is in bad shape, as well as a small wall in front of the house. This will make things safer for her young children.
The materials she needs to buy are rock, sand, cement, iron, and sheets of corrugated iron. She also needs to pay for workers, as that is the only way to make the work to progress more quickly.

loan.use: to buy construction materials to improve her roof and a small wall in front of her house, making things safe for her family

loan.name: Perfect Peach Group

texts.en:
Anita is 31 years old and a single parent of a child. She lives in Takoradi, a coastal city noted for its thriving fishing activities. She describes herself as a hardworking woman.

Anita is the leader of the Perfect Peace Trust Bank group. As the leader of the group, she ensures that all members attend regular meetings and meet their repayment schedule.

For the past six years Anita has sold smoked fish in her community market. She is excited to be receiving a portion of this 1,700 GHS loan from SAT, which she will use to purchase larger quantities of smoked fish to expand her business.

One of Anitas dreams is to get married and work harder to support her child in school.

loan.use: to purchase smoked fish in bulk.

loan.name: Lina

texts.es: La seora Lina tiene 53 aos, est casada, tiene 3 hijos, 2 mayores D. edad y uno en edad escolar. Ella se dedica hace 5 aos al comercio, cuenta con una casilla en su domicilio donD. venD. artculos D. primera necesidad, como ser azcar, yerba, panificados, bebidas y otros. En cuanto a su clientela dice que tiene muy buena cantidad D. los mismos, ya que esta ubicada frente a una fbrica y la mayora D. los empleados D. ese lugar siempre acuden a su negocio a comprar D. ella. Se inici con un pequeo capital ya que antes era vendedora ambulante, y gracias a su ahorro y al esfuerzo que imprime en sus negocios pudo salir adelante y tener lo que hoy en da tiene. Comenta que todo lo que hace es por su familia, ya que desea darles lo mejor y que no les falte nada, brindndoles as una vida digna y decorosa. Solicita el crdito para la compra D. mercaderas varias, como ser azcar, yerba, panificados, bebidas y otros con lo cual podr abastecerse y cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
Seora Lina is 53 years old. She is married with three children, two of whom are grown, and one is school-age. For the last five years she has been working in retail. She has a small stall in her home where she sells everyday items such as sugar, yerba (a traditional vegetable drink), bakery products, drinks and other things.
As regards her customers, she says that she has a good quantity of them, as she is located opposite a factory and the majority of the factory employees come to her business to make purchases. She started with a small amount of capital, as she was previously a street vendor. Thanks to her savings and the effort she has put into her business, she has been able to move ahead and get to where she is today. She comments that everything she has done is for her family, as she wants to give them the best life possible, and for them to lack for nothing. She wants to proviD. them with a decent and dignified life.
She is requesting the loan for the purchase of various merchandise, such as sugar, yerba, bakery items, drinks, and other things with which she can stock up and meet her customers' demand.

loan.use: to purchase sugar, yerba (a traditional vegetable drink), bakery products, drinks and other things to stock up her premises.

loan.name: Elvira

texts.es: La seora Elvira es cliente antigua D. la institucin desD. el ao 2009, esta casada con la el seor Valentn, tiene dos hijas, su domicilio queda ubicado en la zona D. Munaypata D. la ciudad D. La Paz, es una zona muy concurrida D. la ciudad, La cliente tiene un negocio D. tienda D. barrio donD. venD. productos D. primera necesidad, ella es muy conocida por la zona por su amabilidad y el buen trato a sus clientes, el crdito lo destinara para comprar azcar y arroz por quintal, la cliente se siente beneficiada con el crdito Kiva, la Sra. Elvira es muy trabajadora y paga puntual sus cuotas semanales, ella es muy responsable y se encuentra agradecida con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mrs. Elvira has been a client with the institution since 2009. She and her husband Valentin have two daughters, and they live in the bustling Munaypata neighborhood of La Paz. She runs a small market selling staple products to the people in her neighborhood. She is well-known for her kindness and her great customer service. The loan will be used to purchase sugar and rice in bulk. She feels very grateful for the loan maD. available by Kiva. Mrs. Elvira is hardworking and responsible and is punctual in making her weekly payments

loan.use: purchase sugar and rice in bulk

loan.name: Esperanza Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama Esperanza est conformado por las seoras Ivet y Adriana van a comprar con su prstamo zapatos de dama, caballero y nio, la seora Felicita va a comprar sabanas, toallas y colchas, la seora Vicenta va a comprar servilleteros, salseras, floreros de barro y de cermica, la seora Delia va a comprar blusas, pantalones, faldas, ropa interior y uniformes, la seora Dominga va a comprar perfumes, labiales, desodorantes, etc. La seora Felicitas tiene 35 aos de edad, ella vive en unin libre con su esposo, ella tiene 2 hijas de 14 y 16 aos de edad estn estudiando la menor la secundaria y la mayor el bachillerato, ella vende colchas, y sabanas, ella solicito su prstamo para comprar mercanca colchas, toallas, juego de sabanas, cortinas, cobertores y almohadas para surtir su negocio, ella inicio su negocio hace 6 aos, compraba de a poquito ahora ya tiene ms pedidos, su negocio es importante porque conoce a la gente, ella est orgullosa cuando tiene mucha mercanca para ofrecerle a sus clientes y le compran sus productos. La ganancia las utiliza para invertir en mercanca, sus sueos y esperanzas son seguir con su negocio, tenerlo bien surtido, que sus hijas salgan adelante y que estudien. Las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundacin Realidad Les agradecemos por confiar en nosotros y por el apoyo que nos dan para hacer nuestros sueos realidad.
texts.en:
This solidarity group is called "Esperanza" ("Hope"), and is made up of the following women:
Seoras Ivet and Adriana are going to purchase women's, men's and children's shoes with their loan. Seora Felicita will buy sheets, towels and bedspreads. Seora Vicenta will buy napkin rings, saucers, earthenware and ceramic vases. Seora Delia will buy blouses, trousers, skirts, underwear and uniforms. Seora Dominga will buy perfumes, lipsticks, deodorants, etc.
Seora Felicita is 35 years old. She lives in a common law marriage with her husband, and has two daughters aged 14 and 16 who attend school. The younger is in secondary school, and the older is studying for her baccalaureate.
Felicita sells bedspreads and sheets. She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise; bedspreads, towels, bed linens, curtains, blankets and pillows to stock up her business. She began this business six years ago, and made purchases little by little as she got more orders. Her business is important because she knows many people; she is proud when she has a lot of merchandise to offer for sale to her customers and they buy her products.
She uses her earnings to invest in merchandise. Her dreams and hopes are to continue with her business and keep it well-stocked, so that her daughters can get ahead in life and their studies.
The members of the group want to say to Kiva and Fundacin Realidad, "We are grateful to you for your trust in us, and for the support that you give us in making our dreams become reality"

loan.use: to buy bedspreads, bed linens, bath towels, curtains and pillows.

loan.name: Ronald

texts.es: El sr. Ronald es cliente nuevo en la institucin vive en la zona de pacata baja barrio, tiene casa propia es soltero se dedica al transporte publico en una empresa radio taxi desde muy joven es su principal fuente de ingreso para sustentarse, saco el crdito para comprar repuestos para su movilidad ya que esta presentando algunas fallas y esto no le permite realizar una buena atencin a su pasajeros ya que la movilidad se para siempre que esta con pasajeros y esto le ocasiona mucho malestar, el cliente se fue muy satisfecho con el crdito y agradecido con la institucion.
texts.en: Ronald is a new customer with this institution. He lives in the Pacata Baja neighborhood, has his own home, and is single. He works in public transportation for a radio taxi company. Since he was very young, this has been his main source of income to support himself. He took out this loan to buy parts since some have been faulty and they keep him from offering his passengers good service as the car always stalls when he has passengers, which is very distressing for him. This customer was very satisfied with the load and appreciative of this institution.

loan.use: to buy parts

loan.name: Las Cenicientas Group

texts.es: Este grupo esta conformado por diez integrantes indgenas que lo que mas desean es superarse y tener un mejor futuro. Este grupo se llama las cenicientas sus integrantes decidieron ponerle as por que se relacioncionan con el cuento de la Cenicienta que gracias a un hada cambio su vida y ellas gracias al apoyo de fundacion van a cambiar sus vidas para bien. La representante de este grupo es la seora Juana tiene la tiene la edad de cuarenta aos de edad, esta casada con el seor Andrs con quien tiene dos hijos una estudia la primaria y el otro la secundaria. Ella estudio la primaria le gustan mucho las matemticas le ayuda a su hijo para realizar sus tareas ya uno de sus sueos es que terminen una licenciatura. Pidi el prstamo para la compra de: hilos, aros, agujas y listones. Ella se dedica a la elaboracin de servilletas bordadas para la venta, le gusta mucho su trabajo por que sus clientes le comparan por mayoreo, y cuando las personas de su pueblo tienen algn compromiso le compran manteles que son a lo que le ganan ms. Esta muy contenta ya que siempre vende su mercanca y no ha tenido problemas con sus clientes. Las otras integrantes del grupo son: Maximina- se dedica a la elaboracin de tortillas. Antelma- se dedica a la elaboracin de servilletas. Justina- se dedica a la elaboracin de tamales. Lorenza- se dedica a la elaboracin de servilletas. Celiflora- se dedica a la elaboracin de manteles. Antonia - se dedica a la elaboracin de servilletas. Florina- se dedica a la elaboracin de manteles. Alicia- se dedica a la elaboracin de servilletas. Aurelia se dedica a la elaboracin de manteles. Le dan las gracias a fundacion realidad por ayudar a las personas que ms lo necesitan y por confiar en ellas.
texts.en:
This group is made up of ten members who are indigenous Indians. What they most desire is to succeed in life and have a better future.
This group is called "Las Cenicientas" ("The Cinderellas"). The members decided on this name because of the story of Cinderella, who changed her life thanks to a fairy godmother, and because they will be changing their lives for the better thanks to the support of the Foundation.
The representative from this group is Seora Juana, who is 40 years old. She is married to Seor Andrs, with whom she has two children. One attends primary school, and the other secondary school.
Juana studied up to primary level, and very much enjoyed mathematics. She helps her son to do his homework as one of her dreams is for him to get a degree.
She asked for this loan for the purchase of thread, hoops, pins and ribbons. She works making embroidered napkins for sale. She very much enjoys her work as her customers buy in bulk, and when the people in her village have some kind of engagement, they buy tablecloths which earn her even more.
She is very content with things, as she is always able to sell her merchandise and hasn't had any problems with her customers.
The other members of the group are:
Maximina- works making tortillas. Antelma- works making napkins. Justina- works making tamales. Lorenza- works making napkins. Celiflora- works making tablecloths. Antonia - works making napkins. Florina- works making tablecloths. Alicia- works making napkins. Aurelia works making tablecloths.
They give thanks to Fundacion Realidad for helping those who need it and for trusting in them.

loan.use: to sell napkins and tablecloths.

loan.name: Irene

texts.es: La Seora Irene tiene 44 aos D. edad, est casada con el Seor Ramn D. 51 aos D. edad, ellos llevan 25 aos D. casados y tienen la dicha D. tener 8 hijos. La Sra. Irene es comerciante, se dedica a la venta D. sabanas, colchas, edredones, lo cual realiza en forma ambulante por toda la Cuidad y alrededores. Dicha actividad lo emprendieron con mucho sacrificio, mediante un pequeo ahorro con que contaban y con la ayuda D. 4 hijos que se encuentran trabajando en el exterior. Comenta que su trabajo le genera muy buenos ingresos, por lo cual le gustara poder seguir invirtiendo en el. Uno D. los sueos D. la seora es ir ampliando su negocio ya que le genera un buen margen, ella cuenta con la ayuda D. 4 hijos que la ayudan en sus ventas, ella define a su familia como muy trabajadora. Solicita el crdito para la compra D. sabanas, colchas, edredones y otros, con lo cual podr aumentar la cantidad D. sus mercaderas en stock y ed esa forma cumplir con los pedidos D. sus clientes.
texts.en:
Seora Irene is 44 years old, and is married to Seor Ramn who is 51 year old. They have been married for 25 years and have 8 children from the marriage.
Seora Irene works in retailing, selling sheets, bedspreads, and quilts as a street vendor throughout the city and the surrounding areas. They undertook this activity with a lot of self-sacrifice, through a small amount of money that they had saved and with the help of four of their children who work abroad.
She comments that her work earns her a very good income, so she would very much like to be able to continue to invest in it. One of the Seora's dreams is to expand her business as it generates a good margin. She has the assistance of four of her children who help her with the sales, and she defines her family as very hard workers.
She is requesting the loan for the purchase of sheets, bedspreads, quilts and other things, with which she can grow the amount of merchandise she has in stock and in this way meet her customers' orders.

loan.use: to buy sheets, bedspreads, and quilts to build up the merchandise she has in stock.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: To buy food ingredients such as chili peppers, onions, tomatoes, oil and chicken.

loan.name: Santa Catarina Group

texts.es: Este grupo esta conformado por doce integrantes indgenas que se dedican a diferentes actividades econmicas. Este grupo se llama santa Catarina sus integrantes son mujeres con fuerzas para triunfar y salir adelante son persona honradas y trabajadoras con deseos D. superarse. La representante D. este grupo es la seora Raquel una persona que desD. muy chica que empez D. trabajar ya que su familia son D. bajos recursos. Ella se dedica a la venta D. calzado y D. ropa y tambin a la venta D. carne D. res, esta muy contenta por que siempre venD. muy bien ya que le brinda un buen servicio a sus clientes. Pidi el prstamo para la compra D. calzado ya que venD. muy bien y tiene clientes mayoristas y necesita atender sus pedidos y en ocasiones se atrasa por falta D. ingresos. Esta felizmente casada con el seor Gerardo con quien tiene tres hijos: una mujer y dos varones quienes cursan la primaria, le gusta mucho apoyar a sus hijos y darle una mejor calidad D. vida ya que son por quien trabaja da a da Le da las gracias a su esposo por el apoyo que le hado ya que con su ayuda pudo obtener sus negocios y entre los dos pueden mejorar su vida y la D. sus hijos. Las otras integrantes del grupo son: Cecilia- se dedica a la venta D. antojitos mexicanos. Leticia- se dedica a la venta D. antojitos mexicanos. Tomasa- se dedica a la venta D. antojitos mexicanos. Cristina- se dedica a la venta D. antojitos mexicanos. Carina- se dedica a la venta D. tamales. Rogelia- se dedica a la venta D. tamales. Teresa- se dedica a la venta D. antojitos mexicanos. Claudia- se dedica a la venta D. tortillas. Elida- se dedica a la venta D. ropa. Minerva se dedica a la venta D. tamales. Le dan las gracias a fundacion por el apoyo que le ha dado para salir adelante y triunfar en un futuro.
texts.en:
This group consists of 12 indigenous members who are involved in different economic activities. This group is called Santa Catarina and its members are women who have the strength to succeed and get ahead. They are honourable and hardworking people with a desire to excel.
The group representative is Senora Raquel who started work from a very early age as her family is poor.
She asked for the loan to buy shoes as they sell well. She has retail clients and needs to meet their orders. Sometimes she gets behind with these for a lack of funds. She is happily married to Senor Gerardo with whom she has 3 children: a girl and 2 boys who attend primary school. She likes supporting and giving her children a better quality of life as it is for them that she works every day.
She thanks her husband for his support as with his help she was able to set up her busineses and between the two of them they can improve their own and their children's lives.
The other members of the group are: Cecilia- she sells Mexican dishes. Leticia- she sells Mexican dishes. Tomasa- she sells Mexican dishes. Cristina- she sells Mexican dishes. Carina- she sells tamales. Rogelia- she sells tamales. Teresa- she sells Mexican dishes. Claudia- she sells tortillas. Elida- she sells clothes. Minerva she sells tortillas.
They thank the Fudacion for the support given them to get ahead and succeed in the future.

loan.use: to buy shoes for subsequent sale.

loan.name: 3 De Mayo Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama 3 de Mayo est conformado por la seora Tomasa va a comprar con su prstamo un comal de gas, carne, tortillas, platos y vasos, la seora Yolanda Cleofs va a comprar refrescos por caja, la seora Maribel va a comprar lea por carga, la seora Cleotilde va a comprar pollo por kilo, la seora Cristina va a comprar maz por carga. La seora Yolanda Cleofs tiene 45 aos de edad, ella es casada tiene un nio de 2 aos de edad, ella estudio hasta el tercer ao de primaria, ella vende refrescos, ella solicito su prstamo para comprar refrescos, jugos y botellas de agua, ella inicio su negocio hace 3 aos de poquito en poquito, su negocio es importante porque va teniendo ingresos para comprar la comida, ella se siente orgullosa de vender refrescos y darles fiados los refrescos a sus clientes y el da sbado pasan a pagarle, ella est planeando vender maz y lea y lo piensa lograr con el prstamo, ella est feliz con este prstamo por que se va a surtir de refrescos de diferentes sabores y botellitas de agua purificada para proporcionar mejor servicio al cliente, sus sueos y esperanzas son si Dios le presta vida poner una tienda de abarrotes, espera que su nio crezca sano y poderle dar estudios. Las integrantes del grupo le dan las gracias a Kiva y a Fundacin Realidad por el apoyo que les dan, con estos prstamos les favorecen a crecer sus negocio y seguir trabajando para mejorar las familias.
texts.en: This solidarity group is called the 3 de Mayo. It consists of Senora Tomasa who with her loan is going to buy a gas griddle, meat, tortillas, plates and glasses; Senora Yolanda who will buy soft drinks by the case; Senora Maribel who is going to buy firewood by the truckload; Senora Cleotilde who is going to buy chicken by the kilo; Senora Cristina who is going to buy corn by the truckload. Senora Yolanda Cleofs is 45 years old, married and has a 2 year old son. She studied until the thrid grade. She sells soft drinks, fruit juices and bottles of water. She started her business 3 years ago little by little. Her business is important because it provides her with an income with which to buy food. She feels proud of selling drinks and that she can trust her clients to come and pay her on Saturdays. She is planning on selling corn and firewood and is hoping to achieve this with this loan. She is happy with this loan as it will enable her to stock soft drinks of different flavours and bottles of purified water to provide her clients with a better service. Her hopes and dreams are that if 'Dios le presta vida' (God gives her life) to set up a grocery store. She hopes her son will grow up healthy and also hopes to give him an education. The members of the group thank Kiva and the Fundacion Realidad for the support they provide. These loans will encourage them to grow their businesses and continue working to improve their families.

loan.use: to buy soft drinks and bottles of water.

loan.name: Muungano Group

texts.en:
Hesbone is the facilitator of the Muungano group. Hesbone and his group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.
With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Hesbon and his group during Kenyas next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Funds integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.
Hesbone joined One Acre Fund in order to garner additional maize profits from his farm. In the recent 2011 season, Hesbone had a very good maize yield harvesting 8 bags on 1/2 acre of land. Before joining One Ace Fund, Hesbone was only able to harvest 4 bags of maize on 1/2 acre of land.
With income from maize sales, Hesbone will invest in a cow and save for the future.
In 2012, the members of the Muungano group will each plant maize plots between and 1.5 acre of land.

loan.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loan.name: Jenny Janide

texts.es: La seora Jenny tiene 32 aos D. edad, est casada con el Seor Rigoberto D. 39 aos, el cual tiene una gomera. Ellos tienen dos hijos, Rodrigo D. 15 aos D. edad, actualmente en la escuela cursando el noveno grado y Ana Paula D. 5 aos D. edad, esta en pre escolar. La seora Jenny tiene un copetn, empez este negocio desD. muy joven, hace aproximadamente 13 aos. Comenzaron trabajando para otras personas del mismo rubro hasta que decidieron independizarse y lanzarse en el negocio D. venta D. comidas y minutas por cuenta propia, con el correr D. los aos fueron afianzndose y lograr posicionarse en el mercado. Con las ganancias del negocio siempre mantuvieron el hogar y lograron quitar adelante a su familia. Como su copetn la ayuda mucho en la economa D. su casa, es por eso que desea seguir mejorandolo, justamente por ese motivo ella solicita el crdito para las mejoras del local, lo cual le ayudar mucho.
texts.en:
Seora Jenny is 32 years old and is married to Seor Rigoberto who is 39 years old and runs a tyre store. They have 2 children: Rodrigo who is 15 years old and is studying 9th graD. and Ana Paula who is 5 years old and in pre-school.
Seora Jenny has a snack place which she started at a young age about 13 years ago. They started by working for others in the same business until they decided to go it alone and set up their own business selling cooked food and fast food. With the passage of time they consolidated their business and positioned themselves in the market. With the profits they were able to maintain the home and move their family forwards.
As her snack place helps her a lot with the household expenses, she wants to continue improving it. For this very reason she is asking for a loan to improve her premises which will help her a lot.

loan.use: to buy construction materials to improve the premises.

loan.name: Celestino

texts.es:
El seor Celestino esta casado y vive en aldea Las Balitas de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, Celestino desde muy joven se ha dedicado a la agricultura y la cra de ganado, tiene terreno en donde cultiva, y se dedica a la venta de lea, la misma que la lleva a su casa para luego ser comercializada en la ciudad de Nacaome, todos los das sale con su carro cargado de lea seca para distribuirla a sus clientes. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de lea, ya que en estas epocas de mucha lluvia este producto se escasea y se compra mucho mas caro.
Su sueo es tener una buena finca de ganado.
texts.en:
Celestino is married and lives in the village Las Balitas in the city of San Lorenzo.
Since he was very young Celestino has worked in the agriculture and animal breeding. He has land where he farms, and he sells wood which he takes to his home before being sold in the city of Nacaome. Every day he leaves with his car full of wood to deliver to his clients. He will use the loan to buy wood because when it rains a lot this product is scarce and much more expensive.
His dream is to have a good livestock farm.

loan.use: to buy wood

loan.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
El seor Lorenzo esta casado y vive en aldea Las Balitas, Lorenzo desde muy temprana edad se ha dedicado al trabajo de campo, siembra maz y maicillo para sustento de sus familia, tambien cra cerdos, los engorda y luego los saca a la venta, y todos los das por la tardes sale a vender lea en su carreta de bueyes a la ciudad de Nacaome, de este rubro que es el mas fuerte, sostiene a su familia. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de lea, en estos momentos la lea esta por escasearse y tiene que estar preparado para comprar y guardarla, ya que su precio se eleva y es muy dificil de comprar.
Su meta es que su hija se gradu este ao de sus estudios.
texts.en:
Lorenzo is married and lives in the village Las Balitas. Since he was very young Lorenzo has worked in the fields, planting corn and millet to support his family. He also bred pigs, raising them and then taking them for sale. Also every day in the afternoon he goes out to sell wood in his oxcart in the city of Nacaome. This is the area that is the strongest in supporting his family.
He will use the loan to buy wood. Right now wood is scarce and he has to be prepared to buy and save it because the price has gone up and its very difficult to buy it.
His goal is for his daughter to graduate this year.

loan.use: to buy wood.

loan.name: Rosario

texts.es: La Sra. Rosario se dedica a la venta de desayunos, ella es una persona que ha aprendido la actividad de su madre que trabajo en el mercado ramada por ms de 20 aos, ella le enseo el oficio, La Sra. Rosario cuenta con puesto propio y vende desayunos todo el da. Los productos que ofrece son te, caf, api y empanada, la Sra. Rosario cuenta con 4 hijos ella es madre soltera, por cosas del destino, pero ella es valiente y trabaja duro para sacar a sus hijos adelante, Tres hijos estudian en la escuela y uno es menor de edad. El crdito que esta solicitando es para la compra de material de construccin para culminar la construccin de su vivienda. Su aspiracin es tener su propia movilidad para poder trasladar su mercadera y su deseo es el de ver a sus hijos profesionales y convertirse en personas de bien.
texts.en:
Rosario sells breakfast. She learned this work from her mother, who worked in the Ramada Market for more than 20 years and taught her the trade. Rosario has her own stall and sells breakfast all day. The products she offers are tea, coffee, "api" (a Bolivian breakfast drink made of corn), and turnovers.
Rosario has four children. As fate would have it, she is a single mother. But she is courageous and works hard to get her children ahead. Three of her children are students and one is a minor.
The loan she is requesting is to buy construction materials to finish the construction on her home. Her ambition is to have her own vehicle to be able to move her merchandise, and her desire is to see her children become professionals and honest people.

loan.use: to buy construction materials.

loan.name: Huaycheitas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. HUAYCHEITAS iniciar el cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Germn Busch. Est compuesta por ocho integrantes las que estn dirigidas por una mesa directiva a la cabeza de la seora Elizabeth. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de ropa, tienda, macrame, venta de animales, artesana de instrumentos de cuerda, venta de man.
La seora Elizabeth indica que hace dos aos y medio que integra una asociacin comunal en Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitacin de un asesor. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboracin de instrumentos de cuerda, que viene trabajando hace siete aos atrs, este oficio lo aprendi de su esposo.
El crdito que sacar ahora es para el aumento de capital (compra de madera y cuerdas) los que compra de las barracas y los vender en las ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella esta casada y tiene un hijo.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Huaychenitas" will start its fourth loan cycle with Pro Mujer, in the Germn Busch central office. This group has 8 members who are led by a board of directors headed by Elizabeth. The members of this group have a variety of businesses that they are working on, including clothing sales, a store, macrame, animal sales, making stringed instruments, and peanut sales.
Elizabeth states that she joined the communal bank in Pro Mujer two and a half years ago at the invitation of a loan officer. Now she has a business making stringed instruments. She learned this trade from her husband, and she has been doing this work for 7 years.
The loan that she will take now will be used to increase her capital (to buy wood and strings.) She will buy her materials from the warehouses, and sell her instruments in the markets. This type of work allows her to generate resources to support her family as best she can. She is married and has one child.
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the training.

loan.use: to buy materials, strings, etc.

loan.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
El seor Jose Antonio se dedica desde hace 20 aos al cultivo de maz para consumo y venta, tambin el vende lea seca en su carreta de bueyes por las tardes despus de su labor en el campo, sale a la ciudad de Nacaome a vender la lea para obtener ganancias para el sustento de su familia, Jose vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, dos de ellos asisten a la escuela de la comunidad, la mayor parte de su vida, la ha dedicado al campo, vive en una zona donde esa es la nica fuente de ingreso que existe. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de lea seca, desea tener bastante lea porque en estos tiempos de lluvia se eleva el precio de la lea seca, de tanto que llueve es bien dificil secarla.
El tiene un sueo y es que sus hijos sean profesionales y salgan a buscar mejores opciones fuera de esa zona.
texts.en:
Mr. Jose Antonio has been growing corn for 20 years now, both for sale and personal consumption. In the afternoons, after his work in the fields, he also sells dried firewood from his oxcart. He goes out to the city of Nacaome to sell the firewood, in order to earn income to sustain his family. Jose lives with his wife and their three children, two of which attend school in their community. Jose has dedicated the better part of his life to the fields. He lives in a zone where this is the only source of income that exists.
He will use this loan to buy dried firewood. He would like to have enough firewood because during this rainy season, the price of dry firewood increases, since with so much rain, it is difficult to dry it.
Jose has a dream that his children will become professionals and go out to search for better options outside the zone where they live.

loan.use: to buy firewood to resell

loan.name: Herminio

texts.es: El seor Herminio tiene 47 aos de edad, est acompaado con la Seora Silvia de 39 aos de edad, ellos tienen 4 hijos. Don Herminio se dedica al comercio de artculos en general. l se dedica a este rubro hace ms de 10 aos, aproximadamente desde el ao 2000. Comenz su negocio con un capital que obtuvo por la venta de un automvil, en la actualidad tiene variedades de productos lo cual hace que tenga una buena clientela en su local. Comenta que su negocio le trae muchas ganancias porque tiene mucha variedad y eso atrae a los clientes. Comenta que todo lo que hace es por darle a su esposa e hijos lo mejor, ya que desea que tengan una vida digna y decorosa. El utiliza este crdito para la compra de jarras, escobas, palanganas, pelota, zapatillas y otros para abastecer su negocio. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le brinda, ya que de obtener el crdito le ser de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Seor Herminio is 47 years old and is in a relationship with Seora Silvia who is 39 years old. They have 4 children. Don Herminio has a general trade store. He has been working in this for more than 10 years, approximately since the year 2000. He started his business with capital obtained from selling a car. He currently stocks a variety of products which give him a good clientele at his locale. He says that his business gives him a lot of profits because he stocks a variety of things which attracts customers. He says that he does all that he does to give his partner and children the best as he wants them to have a dignified and decent life.
He is using this loan to buy pitchers, brushes, bowls, balls, shoes and other products to stock his business. He thanks the Fundacion for the opportunity provided him as obtaining the loan will be very helpful.

loan.use: to buy brushes, pitchers, shoes to stock up his business.

loan.name: Mara

texts.es:
Mara tiene 26 aos es soltera vive con sus padres en Cayambe que est a media hora de Otavalo en el norte de Ecuador. Se describe como una mujer emprendedora.
Mara trabaja sola en la crianza de animales (cerdos), inici su negocio con un corral de madera y dos cerdos. Es el cuarto crdito que le solicita a Fodemi el cul que ser utilizado para la compra de balanceado que es la alimentacin de sus animales, esta inversin le incentiva para seguir trabajando.
Su sueo es que su negocio crezca da a da.
texts.en:
Mara is 26 years old, she is single and she lives with her parents in Cayambe, located half an hour away from Otavalo, in northern Ecuador. She describes herself as a very resourceful woman.
Mara works by herself breeding animas (pigs). She started her activity with a wooden pen and two pigs. This is the fourth loan she has requested to Fodemi, and she will use it to buy animal feed for her animals. Thanks to this loan she feels encouraged to keep on working.
She wishes for her activity to keep on growing.

loan.use: To buy animal feed for her animals.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy a cow.

loan.name: Benito

texts.es: El seor Benito se dedica a la comercializacin de granos de maz y venta de refrescos, Benito vive con sus cuatro hijos y su esposa, don Benito se levanta muy temprano a vender el maiz y al terminar la jornada, trabaja por las noches como guardia de seguridad en un centro educativo. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de lea, en esta epoca, la lea seca es un producto que se vende muy bien. Su meta es tener un buen negocio en su casa, en el cual pueda ofrecer varios productos a sus clientes, las ganancias las necesita para cubrir los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en:
Benito sells corn, and he sells soft drinks. He lives with his four children and his wife. Benito gets up very early to sell the corn. When he finishes his work day he works at night as a security guard at an educational center.
He will use the loan to buy firewood. During this season dried wood is a product that sells very well.
His goal is to have a good business at his house. In this business he would be able to sell various products to his customers. He needs the income to cover the household expenses.

loan.use: to buy firewood.

loan.name: Esperanza

texts.es: Esperanza tiene 41 aos, es una mujer alegre y muy sociable, convive con su pareja, con quien tiene dos hijos de 18 y 12 aos, quienes estn en etapa escolar. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, y lo que ms desea es trabajar bastante para dar lo mejor a sus hijos. El trabajo de Esperanza consiste en la realizacin de manicure y pedicure (arreglo de las uas de las manos y pies), adems realiza peinados, cortes, tintes, entre otros peinaos. Ella y su hermana comparten un espacio dentro de la casa de su madre, ejerciendo su propios negocios. Tiene ocho aos en este trabajo y considera muy ventajoso porque administra su horario y puede dedicarse a otras actividades. Ahora lo que ms prioriza es poder implementar su salon de belleza. Este ser el primer crdito con MFP, por lo9 que espera el apoyo de ustedes para continuar desarrollando su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, comprar materiales y accesorios para implementar su salon de belleza y as pueda ofrecer un buen servicio a sus fieles clientes.
texts.en:
Esperanza, age 41, is a very happy and a very friendly woman. She lives with her life partner and their two school-age children, ages 18 and 12. They live together in their own house. What she wishes for the most is to work enough to give her children the best.
Esperanza works giving manicures and pedicures (doing nails on hands and feet). She also does hairstyles, cuts, and color, among other hair services. She and her sister share a space in her mothers house operating their own businesses. She has been in this work for eight years. She considers it to be very beneficial because she sets her schedule, and she is able to work in other business activities.
Her biggest priority now is to be able to implement her beauty salon. This will be her first loan with MFP, and she hopes to have your support to continue developing her business. She will use the requested loan to buy materials and accessories to implement her beauty salon. That way she will be able to offer good service to her loyal customers.

loan.use: to buy beauty products and materials.

loan.name: Lupe Elizabeth

texts.es: La seora Lupe cliente que se encuentra en la segunda secuencia de su crdito, la Sra. Lupe esta casada con el Sr. Roberto, viven en casa familiar del Papa de la Sra. Lupe, en la zona el tejar, la Sra. Lupe se dedica a la confeccin de prendas de vestir en especial ropa deportiva a pedido y tambin entrega sus productos en diferentes mercados de la ciudad, su esposo es empleado de una empresa el trabaja como operario. El crdito lo invertir en la compra de material de construccin para la refaccin de un cuarto donde viven actualmente, la cliente se siente beneficiada y agradecida con la institucin por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
Lupe is a client in her second loan cycle. Lupe is married to Robert, and they live in Lupes fathers home in the Tejar area.
