Lupe makes clothing, especially sports clothing to order and she also delivers her products to different merchants in the city. Her spouse is employed in a factory as an operator.
She will invest the loan in the purchase of construction material to renovate a room where they currently live. The lender feels lucky and thankful to the institution for the unique opportunity. Her dream is to have a good livestock farm.

loan.use: to buy construction material

loan.name: Jonatha Ignacio

texts.es: Jonathan tiene 25 aos, su actividad es la venta de mercadera en general. Hace ms de 2 aos. Este negocio lo aprendi por su propia cuenta pues tena que buscar el medio de sufragar los gastos de su hogar, a pesar no tener muchos aos con el negocio ha sabido administrarlo. El crdito que solicita es para la compra de ropa, calzado, cremas, sabanas, tratamientos entre otros. La mayora de sus clientes siempre le solicitan variedad en sus productos.
texts.en: Jonathan is 25 years old. His activity has been selling general merchandise for more than 2 years. He learned this business on his own, since he had to pay his household expenses. Despite being somewhat young, he was able to run his business. He is asking for the loan to buy clothes, shoes, creams, sheets, and treatments, among other things. Most of his customers are always asking him for a variety of products.

loan.use: to buy clothes, shoes, creams, sheets, and treatments, among other things.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy replacement parts and materials for repairing vehicles

loan.name: Rosiris Margoth

texts.es: Rosiris de 42 aos y en condiciones de viuda vive en San Jacinto, con sus 4 hijos, en las edades de 6 a 21 aos, tres de los cuales estudian y el mayor trabaja; all en esta tierra donde sobreabundan las artesanas en tejido vertical, Rosiris se dedica justamente a la produccin Hamacas, Bolsos y fajones, actividad que aprendi por tradicin familiar, y desde que qued viuda, se concentr ms en ella. As es que durante el da trabaja tejiendo las hamacas y en la noche teje fajones por servicio o tejida y se gana en cada fajn $2.000 COP y ella teje un mnimo de 3 por noche. Viven en su propia casa, cerca de su madre y de otros hermanos Su familia es muy solidaria con Rosiris, pues desde que muri su esposo, apoyaron la crianza de sus hijos y an siguen hacindolo. Hoy da gracias a Dios, porque tiene un hijo que trabaja y aporta para los gastos del hogar. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprar hilazas de algodn para lograr una produccin mayor. Ella se siente muy segura y supone una inversin exitosa, porque conoce esta actividad perfectamente, ha tenido la experiencia crediticia, siempre ha pagado puntualmente con la produccin de sus hamacas y adicionalmente tiene el gran apoyo de su madre, quien trabaja con ella las artesanas. En la actualidad Rosiris ha recibido 2 financiamiento de la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, durante dos aos; con ellos logr comprar materiales para hacer hamacas y mochilas y tambin compr animales de especies menores, como cerdo y gallina y ella dice que cuando terminaba de pagarle a la Fundacin, le quedaba un cerdo o dos, y sus gallinas de ganancia. Sus sueos o metas en cuanto al negocio es capitalizarlo para tener ms productos y en cuanto a su hogar, es mejorar su vivienda y que sus hijos terminen sus estudios de secundaria y continen carreras universitarias. Mientras Rosiris trabaja para lograr sus sueos, genera un Margen de Contribucin de 45.9%, una Rotacin de Inventarios de 15 das y una Rotacin de cuentas por cobrar de 1 da, es decir todo lo que vende a crdito, se lo pagan al da siguiente. Desde estos indicadores financieros proyectamos su crecimiento potencial y auguramos una inversin exitosa con su credikiva.
texts.en:
Rosiris, 42, is a widow who lives in San Jacinto with her four children, ages six through 21. Three of them study and the eldest works. In a land where vertical weaving is an abundant craft, Rosiris earns a living making hammocks, bags and bands, which is a trade she learned as a family tradition. When she became a widow she began to focus more on the activity. During the day she makes hammocks and at night she makes bands to order earning 2,000 COP per band. She makes a minimum of three per night. They live in their own house close to her mother and two siblings. Her family is very supportive of Rosiris and ever since her husband passed away they have helped out raising the children. And thankfully there is one son who works and contributes to the household expenses.
This is her first credikiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation and she plans to buy cotton yarn to increase production. She is very sure that the investment will be successful because she is perfectly familiar with the business and has had loan experience. She has always paid them back on time through her hammock production and she also has the support of her mother who helps her make the crafts.
Rosiris has received two loans through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation in the past two years. With them she has been able to buy materials to make hammocks and back-packs, as well as small animals such as pigs and hens. When she finished paying back the Foundation she still had a couple of pigs and hens as a profit. Her goal is to capitalize her business so she can add more products. She also wants to improve her house and insure her children finish their secondary education and get a university degree. While Rosiris works toward her goal, she generates a contribution margin of 45.9%, an inventory turnover of 15 days and an accounts receivable turnover of one day, so what she sells on credit is paid the next day. These are the financial indicators that we have used to project growth potential and we forecast a successful investment with her credikiva.

loan.use: To buy cotton yarn to increase production.

loan.name: Magaly Esther

texts.es: Magaly de 50 aos vive con su esposo en el barrio las Amricas al suroccidente de la ciudad y tiene 3 hijos en las edades de 21 a 26 aos. En familia poco a poco han construido sus sueos, as como con sus ahorros lograron comprar un lote y gradualmente, paso a paso, tener hoy su vivienda propia. En lo que han logrado en familia, ha estado presente su negocio, pues sin l no hubiera sido posible su crecimiento familiar, empresarial y personal. Magaly vende mercanca variada como ropa, calzado, fantasa, desde hace 15 aos. Distribuye sus productos a crdito en plazos acordados con sus clientes que son vecinos, familiares y empleados referidos por sus mejores compradores. Su experiencia data desde cuando tena 15 aos y ya trabajaba en almacenes de fabricacin de prendas de vestir. Gracias a esta actividad ha podido estar muy cerca de la educacin de sus hijos y esto es muy importante para su familia. Su credikiva es el crdito # 11 que Magaly hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, organizacin a la que ha estado vinculada durante 10 aos y con los cuales ha logrado un mejoramiento de las condiciones habitacionales de su familia; con su primer credikiva comprar mecedoras en la ciudad de Sincelejo y los distribuir entre clientes interesados que ya han realizado sus pedidos. En la actualidad su rotacin de cuentas por cobrar es de 15 das mientras su rentabilidad sobre las ventas es de 35%, indicadores financieros desde los cuales proyectamos su potencial crecimiento y auguramos una inversin exitosa de su credikiva.
texts.en:
Magaly, 50, lives with her husband in the Amricas neighborhood on the southwest side of the city and they have three children, ages 21 through 26. As a family they have built their dreams little by little and with their savings were able to eventually own their own home. Also the family achievements show in the current business which has been responsible for family, entrepreneurial and personal growth.
Magaly has been selling different merchandise such as clothing, shoes and accessories for 15 years. She distributes her products on a credit basis to her customers who include neighbors, family and referred acquaintances through her best buyers. Her experience dates back to when she was 15 years old and worked for a clothing manufacturer. Thanks to this activity she has been able to supervise her children's education and this is very important for the family. Her credikiva is the 11th loan Magaly has had through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. She has been a member for ten years and has been able to improve her family's lifestyle thanks to the loans. Her first credikiva will be used to buy rocking chairs in the city of Sincelejo which she will distribute among interested customers who have already placed orders. Her current accounts receivable turnover is 15 days and profit on sales is 35%. These are the financial indicators we used to project growth potential and we forecast a successful investment from her credikiva.

loan.use: To buy and distribute rocking chairs.

loan.name: Marlyn

texts.es: Marlyn desde Pradomar,cerca a las Payas en el municipio de Puerto Colombia, da las gracias a sus financiadores por apoyar tantos negocios pequeos en el mundo; ella est preparndose para su segundo credikiva, porque va a comprar ingredientes para elaborar sus productos como harina de trigo, aceite , azcar, margarina, carnes fras, desechables y bandejas, as mismo comprar un molino elctrico de maz y har algunas reformas locativas al saln de produccin. Con su anterior credikiva logr descuentos por la compra de ingredientes y se siente muy satisfecha de su inversin. Ella textualmente envia el siguiente mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva: "Reciban desde las clidaas y costeras tierras de Puerto Colombia un gran saludo de agradecimiento, por toda la ayuda recibida, deseando que todos los fondeadores y sus familias sean bendecidos y prosperdos enormemente por el Dios de la Misericordia." Si usted quiere conocer la historia de Marlyn, ingrese al siguiente enlace: http://kiva.org/lend/243055
texts.en:
From Pradomar, near Las Payas in the municipality of Puerto Colombia, Marlyn sends her thanks to the lenders who are helping small business owners throughout the world. She is getting ready for her second credkiva which she will use to buy food ingredients such as flour, oil, sugar, margarine, cold meats, disposables and trays. Shealso will buy an electric corn grinder and carry out improvements at her production shop. With her previous credikiva she was able to get discounts on ingredient purchases and she is very pleased with the investment.
She would like to send the following message to the Kiva lenders: "From the warm, coastal lands of Puerto Colombia, receive a greeting of appreciation for all the help received, with hopes that our Merciful God will bless and make prosperous all the lenders and their families."
If you would like to know more about Marlyn, click on the following link: http://kiva.org/lend/243055

loan.use: To buy food ingredients and an electric corn grinder, and make improvements to the production shop.

loan.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es: Luis de 42 aos vive con su cnyuge y sus tres hijos en las edades de 5 a 16 aos. l tiene un negocio donde vende frutas, el cual inici hace 25 aos, cuando viva en su natal Zambrano, (poblacin del departamento de Bolvar) y decidi buscar en la ciudad de Barranquilla mejores oportunidades de bienestar. l inici vendiendo frutas por las calles de algunos barrios de la ciudad, all tambin conoci a su cnyuge con quien lleva 18 aos de convivencia y ella se dedica a la venta de productos por catlogos, con los que genera ingresos para apoyar tambin su hogar. Desde ese tiempo el negocio de Luis ha crecido y por eso cuando logr aumentar las ventas, conseguir una acreditada clientela, respondi a la necesidad de un punto fijo, consiguiendo ubicarse en el centro de la ciudad, donde an permanece, desde hace 20 aos. Luis en su negocio vende fresas, peras, manzanas, uvas, en una frecuencia diaria y de contado; realiza sus compras, tambin de contado y con una frecuencia de 3 veces por semana. El negocio es atendido directamente por su propietario, a quien acuden empleados bancarios, de supermercados, miscelneas, locales comerciales, etc., pues su estratgica ubicacin le da acceso a ellos, pues muy cerca, se encuentran 4 instituciones bancarias y ms de 6 centros comerciales. Su competencia la conforman los vendedores que deambulan por las calles ofreciendo tambin frutas. Su meta es lograr mayor crecimiento de su negocio, as como tambin que sus hijos obtengan una educacin tcnica que les permita enfrentar el futuro con responsabilidad. Mientras el y su esposa trabajan y anan esfuerzos, Luis en su negocio, consigue un margen de contribucin de 27,66% una rotacin de inventarios de 4 das y una rentabilidad sobre las ventas de 23,61%, indicadores financieros desde los cuales proyectamos su potencial crecimiento y auguramos una inversin exitosa de su credikiva, con el cual comprar frutas en mayor volumen que el acostumbrado, para ganar descuentos.
texts.en:
Luis, 42, lives with his wife and three children, ages five to 16. He has a fruit business that he set up 25 years ago when he lived in his home town of Zambrano (in the department of Bolvar). He decided to seek out better lifestyle opportunities in the city of Barranquill where he began selling fruit in the streets of some of the neighborhoods, and there he met his wife of 18 years. She sells products by catalogue and generates an income to help cover household expenses.
Since then Luis's business has expanded so when he was able to increase sales and gain an accredited customer base he established a stall in the center of town where he has been for 20 years. Luis sells strawberries, pears, apples and grapes every day and on a cash basis. He buys his produce, also in cash, three times a week. He manages the business directly and attends to its customers which include employees from banks, supermarkets, local shops, etc.
His strategic location is easily accesible because he is close to four banking institutions and over six shopping centers. His competition comes mainly from the street vendors who also sell fruit. His goal is to grow the business and insure that his cildren get a technical education that will help them take on the future. Meanwhile, he and his wife work hard. Luis has a contribution margin of 27.66%, an inventory turnover of 4 days and a profit on sales of 23.61%. These are the financial indicators that we used to project growth potential and we forecast a successful investment with his credikiva. He plans to use it to buy bulk fruits to obtain discounts.

loan.use: To buy bulk fruits.

loan.name: Benjamin

texts.es: El seor Benjamn se dedica a la comercializacin de lea, maz y a la cra de ganado, Benjamin vive con sus cuatro hijos y su esposa, sus hijos le ayudan con el cuidado del ganado y al acarreo de la lea, don Benjamin es una persona muy humilde y seria. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de lea seca. en la zona en donde vive Benjamin esta lloviendo mucho y la lea seca es muy dificil de encontrar, muchos hogares en esta zona, por no decir todos, utilizan este tipo de producto para cocinar. Su meta es que sus hijos terminen la secundaria y luego enviarlos a la universidad.
texts.en: Benjamin works in the trade of firewood, and in corn and livestock. He lives with his 4 children and his wife. His children help care for the livestock, and with the hauling of firewood. Benjamin is very humble and serious. He will use this loan to buy dry firewood. He lives in an area that receives a lot of rain and dry firewood is very hard to find. Many homes in this area use this type of product for cooking. His goal is for his children to finish high school, then to send them to college.

loan.use: to buy firewood

loan.name: Cirilo

texts.es: El seor Cirilo tiene 65 aos de edad, est casado con la seora Patrocinia quien es docente jubilada, tienen 2 hijas ya mayores de edad y con ingresos independientes, viven en un barrio muy conocido de la ciudad de It,. Poseen una despensa en su domicilio hace mas de 30 aos, all surte a vecinos y a ocasionales clientes con lcteos, bebidas en general, azcar, arroz, yerba, carne, sal, panificados, carbn y otros insumos de primera necesidad, ademas vende artculos de librera, bazar y artculos para regalo. Antes de iniciar este negocio estuvo mucho trabajando en la Argentina como empleado, el seor Cirilo sostiene que esta actividad ayud a su familia a realizarse como profesionales ya que una de sus hijas es docente y la otra es masajista profesional, las mismas lo ayudan a en la manutencin del hogar. El solicita el crdito para la compra de azcar, arroz, yerba, carne, sal, panificados, carbn y otros insumos para abastecer su despensa.
texts.en:
Seor Cirilo is 65 years old, he is married to Seora Patrocinia who is a retired teacher and they have two grown-up, financially independent daughters. They live in a well known neighborhood in the city of It. They have a store in their home where they provide their neighbors and drop-in customers with milk, other drinks, sugar, rice, herbs, meat, salt, baked goods, coal and other basic necessities. They also sell books, stationary and gifts.
Before starting this business Seor Cirilo worked as a clerk in Argentina for a long time. He maintains that this helped his family to become professionals as one of his daughters is a teacher and the other is a professional masseuse and they both help out with the maintenance of the home.
He is requesting the loan to buy sugar, rice, herbs, meat, salt, baked goods, coal and other supplies to stock his shop.

loan.use: to buy sugar, rice, herbs, meat, salt, baked goods, coal and other supplies.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy fruit, noodles, potatoes, oil, and other items

loan.name: Simona

texts.es: La seora Simona naci en la ciudad de Cochabamba, convive con el seor Flavio con el cual tienen 3 hijos, y viven en la comunidad de Huaytu de la provincia Ichilo, hace 9 aos que ellos se dedican a la agricultura, siembran maz, caf y yuca, hace dos Secuencias que estn trabajando con la institucin, el prstamo lo van a invertir en la ampliacin de las plantaciones de caf y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra para la siembra, por lo cual ellos agradecen todo el apoyo que la institucin le ha brindado.
texts.en: Simona was born in the city of Cochabamba. She lives with Flavio and they have 3 children. They live in the community of Huaytu in the province of Ichilo. For the last 9 years they have been working in agriculture, growing corn, coffee and cassava. They have had 2 cycles with the communal bank. The loan will be used to invest in the expansion of the coffee plantations and getting the land ready for planting. They are grateful for support that the communal bank has provided.

loan.use: to expand

loan.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda tiene 22 aos vive con sus padres en Cayambe que est a media hora de Otavalo en el norte de Ecuador. Yolanda se describe como una persona muy responsable en su trabajo.
Trabaja con sus padres en el ordeo de vacas para vender la leche. Es su segundo crdito que le solicita a Fodemi el cual va a ser utilizado en la compra de una vaca lechera para incrementar su produccin y sus ventas lo cual le ayuda considerablemente para mantener a su familia.
Su sueo es poder construir un establo para poder tener mayor cantidad de vacas.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 22 years old and lives with her parents in Cayambe which is half an hour from Otavalo, in the north of Ecuador. Yolanda describes herself as somebody who is very responsible in her work.
Yolanda works with her parents milking cows so that they can sell their milk. This is the second loan that she has requested from Fodemi and she will use it to buy a dairy cow to increase her production and her sales. This will help her a lot in supporting her family.
Yolanda's dream is to build a stable so that she can keep a larger number of cows.

loan.use: to buy a dairy cow

loan.name: Dionicio

texts.es: El seor Dionicio se dedica a la cra de cerdos y venta de lea, su negocio lo inicio junto con su esposa, misma que le ayuda a cuidar a sus cerdos, Dionicio los engorda hasta que estn listos para la venta, durante el dia Dionicio sale a comprar lea y la lleva a su casa para la venta. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de alimentos para los cerdos, en unos meses viene la epoca de navidad y ahi es cuando mas vende y desea estar preparado para dicha fecha. Su sueo es tener una buena porqueriza donde pueda incrementar la cria de los cerdos y asi tener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Dionicio raises pigs and sells firewood. He started his business with his wife who helps him take care of the pigs. Dionicio fattens the animals until they are ready to sell. During the day, he goes out to buy firewood which he takes home to sell.
Dionicio will use this loan to buy pig feed. In a few months time the Christmas holidays will be here and that is when he sells the most. He would like to be ready for that date.
Dionicio's dream is to have a good pigsty where he can increase his pig raising business and thereby make more profits.

loan.use: to buy concentrated feed for his pigs

loan.name: Juntas Progresaremos Group

texts.es: Guisela tiene 26 aos de edad es la mas joven en la alcanca JUNTAS PROGRESAREMOS, es madre soltera, tiene una nia de 3 aos de edad la cual es la persona que le da fuerzas para seguir adelante, Guisela se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza en el cual se viene desempeando por mas de 3 aos, a lo largo de este tiempo indica que ha podido superarse ya que ahora tiene 35 personas a su cargo los cuales distribuyen las los productos que ella compra, el sueo que tiene es lograr tener una saln de belleza para de esta manera mejorar su estilo de vida, indica que el prstamo lo empleara en la compra de mas productos ya que por esta temporadas la demanda de productos aumenta.
texts.en: Guisela is 26 years old. She is the youngest member of the 'Juntas Progresaremos' (We Will Make Progress Together) community bank. Guisela is a single mother and has a 3-year-old daughter who gives her the strength to get ahead. Guisela has been selling beauty products for mO. than three years. Over these years, she tells us that she has done well as she is now responsible for 35 people who distribute the products that she buys. Her dream is to own a beauty salon so that she can improve her lifestyle. She says that she will use the loan to buy mO. products as the demand for her products increases at this time of year.

loan.use: to buy more products

loan.name: Amos

texts.es: El seor Amos es de la ciudad de Santan, tiene casa propia, est casado, es propietario de un pequeo Almacn en su propio domicilio, tambin trabaja como macatero, recorre por toda la zona de Bertoni. Segn comenta empez su almacn con su esfuerzo y sacrificio, tiene una camioneta, en la cual se moviliza fcilmente y moviliza los productos para su almacn. Su sueo es de tener un local mas amplio para poder surtir ms su negocio y as obtener ms clientes y satisfacer las necesidades de los mismos. Es una persona muy responsable, honesta y trabajadora, que lucha da a da para salir adelante y solventar los gastos de la familia. El solicita el crdito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, lcteos y otros para el abastecimiento de su negocio. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que le da, pues de obtener el crdito le ser de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Amos is from the city of Santan. He has his own house, is married, and is the owner of a small store in his own home. He also works as a street merchant traveling throughout the area of Bertoni. He says that he began his store with a lot of effort and sacrifice. He has a truck in which he can easily organize the products for the store.
His dream is to expand his business in order to have more items to sell so that he can get more customers and satisfy their needs. He is a responsible person, honest and hard working who fights day after day in order to get ahead and meet the family expenses.
He is asking for this loan in order to buy food, drinks, dairy products, and other necessities for his business. He is grateful to the Foundation for the support they have given him in that the loan is going to be very helpful.

loan.use: to buy food, drinks, dairy products, and other necessities

loan.name: Gina

texts.es: Gina tiene 30 aos, es una mujer emprendedora y muy trabajadora, es madre soltera de un nio de diez aos, quien es el motivo de vivir y trabajar, ya que desea darle una mejor calidad de vida y una buena educacin. Juntas habitan en su casa propia, donde comparte con sus dos hermanas que le ayudan en algunos gastos del hogar. EL trabajo de Gina consiste en la venta de ropa, dicha mercadera lo trae de la ciudad de Lima, y que son ofrecidos a amistades, vecinos y familiares, y compaeros de trabajo, pues labora para una institucin local. Durante 10 aos que continua trabajando, trayendo diseos muy novedosos y que son del gusto de la mayora de sus clientes. Por ello espera la puedan ayudar nuevamente para poder invertir en su negocio. Su fin es tener una tienda de abarrotes y un puesto de venta de ropa en algn mercado de su ciudad. Este ser el cuarto crdito con MFP, y por tanto espera la ayuda de ustedes para desarrollar su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, comprar mercadera para tener en exhibicin y que sus clientes tengan ms opcin de escorger.
texts.en:
Gina is 30 years old. She is an entrepreneurial and very hard-working woman. She is the single mother of a 10-year-old boy who is her motivation to live and work as she would like to provide him with a better quality of life and a good education. They live together in their own home which they shares with her two sisters who help her with some of the household expenses. Gina's business is selling clothes which she buys in the city of Lima and then sells to friends, neighbors, family members, and work colleagues as she works for a local institution.
Gina has been working for ten years, selling the very latest designs which are to the taste of most of her customers. She hopes that you will help her once again so that she can invest in her business. Her goal is to have a grocery store and a clothes stall in a market in her town. This will be her fourth loan from MFP and she hopes that you will help her to develop her business. Gina will use the sum she has requested to buy merchandise to display so that her customers have more choices.

loan.use: to buy more clothes

loan.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es: Reina, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella tiene una pequea tienda el cual vende productos de primera necesidad como: arroz, frijoles, azcar, detergentes, jabn,ademas de ofrecer ropa, el negocio lo comenz con la ayuda de su cuada y lo tiene en su casa por eso no tiene un horario establecido. El prstamo lo utilizara para comprar ms productos de la canasta bsica como: arroz, azcar, frijoles, huevos y surtirla ms el cual le permitir ampliar ms su negocio y a tender mejor a sus clientes. El sueo de Reina tener un negocio ms grande y que su familia viva feliz econmicamente.
texts.en:
Reina lives with her husband and her two children. She has a little store where she sells basic staples such as rice, beans, sugar, detergents, soap, and in addition, she sells clothes. She began this business with the help of her sister-in-law and because the store is in her home, she is able to determine her own daily set schedule of business hours.
She is going to use this loan in order to buy more basic shopping basket items such as rice, sugar, beans, and eggs, in order to expand her store and to assist her clients better. Reina's dream is to have a bigger business and for her family to live happily within their means.

loan.use: to buy products for her store such as rice, sugar, beans and eggs

loan.name: Eva Lucia

texts.es: La seora Eva tiene 58 aos D. edad, est casada, vive con sus hijos menores en la ciudad D. Paraguar. Eva cuenta con un saln D. belleza, es uno D. lo ms antiguos D. la ciudad D. Paraguar, cuenta con clientela formada, justamente por el tiempo que lleva en esto. Tiene 4 hijos, los cuales trabajan y estudian por cuenta propia, es una seora muy sacrificada que gracias a sus esfuerzos y sacrificios pudo salir adelante en su negocios. Comenta que su negocio es el sustento D. la familia y que este le es D. mucha ayuda. Ella se considera una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora. Le gustara poder seguir con su peluquera y D. esa forma seguir ayudando a su familia. Solicita el crdito para la compra D. accesorios para su saln D. belleza, como ser juegos tijeras, sprays, gel y otros. Agradece por la oportunidad que la Fundacin le da.
texts.en:
Eva is 58 years old, married, and lives with her 2 younger sons in the city of Paraguar. Eva has a beauty salon and it is one of the oldest in Paraguar, with an established clientele, clearly because of the time she has spent on it. She has 4 children who work and study on their own.
She is a self-sacrificing woman and thanks to her effort and sacrifices she could get ahead in her business. She says that her business provides the family income and is very helpful.
She is considered to be a hard working person and a fighter. She wants to continue with her beauty salon business and thus be able to support her family.
She is asking for this loan to buy accessories for her salon such as shears, sprays, and gels, among other items. She is grateful for the opportunity the Foundation has given her.

loan.use: to buy shears, sprays, and gels, among other items.

loan.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Isabel tiene la edad de 20 aos, es soltera y no tiene nios ella vive con sus papas y tiene una tienda de abarrotes, el impulso de ayudar a sus padres hizo que ella pusiera su tienda da abarrotes para poder ayudarles con los gastos de la casa ya que ella esta al pendiente de ellos y tiene que mantenerlos ya que son personas grandes. Isabel tiene con su negocio aproximadamente 4 aos, ella vende frutas, legumbres, jabn, aceite, leche, papel higinico, dulces, huevo, refrescos etc. comenta que esta pidiendo un crdito por que quiere seguir invirtiendo en su tienda por que la quiere tener muy bien surtida. A diario ella abre su tienda a las 7 de la maana y sierra para comer y abecs sierra a las 9 de la noche, platica que sus papas abecs le ayuda a cuidar la tienda. Ella esta muy contenta por el crdito que le otorgaran por que as podr hacer crecer mas rpido su negocio.
texts.en:
Isabel is 20 years old. She is single, without children. She lives with her parents and has a grocery store.
She started her grocery business because of an urge to help her parents with the household expenses. She always has her eye on them and takes care of them because they are older.
She has had her business about 4 years. She sells fruit, vegetables, soap, oil, milk, toilet paper, sweets, eggs, soft drinks and other items. She tells us that she is asking for a loan in order to continue investing in the business by keeping it well stocked.
She opens the stores every day at 7:00 AM, shutting it to eat, and she sometimes closes the store as late in the evening as 9:00 PM. Sometimes her parents chat with her and help her take care of the store.
She is very happy about the loan, which will help her business to grow more rapidly.

loan.use: to buy purchases for her store

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy building supplies with which to start re-building her house, to provide a better home for her family

loan.name: Quenia Mercedes

texts.es: Quenia, es originaria de una comarca llamada Las Maras, ubicada en Len, ella tiene 39 aos de edad, es madre de 4 hijos, es comerciante se dedica a vender y elaborar tortillas, lleva 1 aos y medio con este negocio. Anteriormente venda cuajadas, frijoles cocidos y lea. Tambin trabajo como domestica pero decidi tener un negocio propio que le permitiera pasar ms tiempo con sus hijos. Ella dice que con la experiencia que ha adquirido durante estos aos le han permitido sobrevivir de su negocio ayudar a sus hijos a estudiar y solventar parte de los gastos de su hogar. Realizo el prstamo para comprar materia prima como maz, lea y cal para elaborar sus tortillas. Con esta inversin podr adquirir ms fcilmente la materia prima que necesita, podr producir un poco ms y mejorar sus ingresos. Dentro de sus metas nos dice que ella quiere poner una pulpera, hacerle reparaciones a su cocina que es donde elabora sus tortillas, tambin mejorar el resto de la infraestructura de su casa.
texts.en:
Quenia is originally from a district called Las Maras which is located in Len. She is 39 years old and the mother of four children. She is a saleswoman whose business is making and selling tortillas. She has been in this business for one and a half years. She used to sell curd, baked beans and firewood. She also worked as a maid but decided to set up her own business which would allow her to spend more time with her children. She says that the experience she has gained over the years has enabled her to survive in her business, help her children study and cover some of her household expences.
Quenia requested this loan to buy raw materials such as corn, firewood and lime with which to make her tortillas. This investment will enable her to acquire the raw materials she needs more easily. This means she will be able to produce more and improve her income. She tells us that some of her goals are to set up a grocery store, to make some repairs to the kitchen where she makes her tortillas and to improve the rest of the infrastructure of her house.

loan.use: to buy supplies such as corn, firewood and lime for making her tortillas

loan.name: Calixto

texts.es: El seor Calixto tiene 41 aos de edad, es taxista en la zona urbana de la ciudad, es separado con 2 hijos. Empez en la actividad como chofer desde muy joven, hoy en da cuenta con una parada de taxi y mvil propio. Comenta que todo lo que tiene es gracias a su arduo trabajo, pues siempre se ha sacrificado mucho por lograr su propsitos y metas. Gracias a su trabajo ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos y brindarles lo que ellos necesitan para una vida digna y decorosa, sin privaciones. Solicita el prstamo para la compra de repuestos para la reparacin de su vehculo, ya que ese es su medio de trabajo y necesita mantenimiento. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le brinda.
texts.en:
Calixto is 41 years old, and is a taxicab driver in the downtown area of the city. He is separated with 2 children. He began this work as a driver when he was very young. Today he has his own taxi stand and his own cell phone.
He says that all he has is thanks to his hard work, and he has always sacrificed a lot to achieve his plans and goals. Thanks to his work he has been able to provide a good life for his children giving them everything they need to have a decent and dignified life, without hardships.
He is asking for this loan in order to buy spare parts to repair his taxicab, as he needs his car to do his work and has to maintain it. He is grateful to the Foundation for the help it offers him.

loan.use: to buy spare parts in order to repair his taxicab

loan.name: Sebastiana

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Sebastiana; la socia tiene 41 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 18, 13, 10, 8, aos de edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura y tambin tiene animales menores, la socia tiene cuyes, gallinas, chanchos, ovejas, la socia se dedica al comercio de granos, la socia vende cereales, ella produce tarwi, trigo, cebada, habas, los cuales lleva a vender todos los sbados al mercado en Cusco, la socia desea el crdito para poder sembrar nuevamente sus productos y venderlos, la socia comprara semilla, pagara el tractor para pasar y remover la tierra, y despus de 1 mes abonara su terreno. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para sembrar y para pagar al tractor, ms la compra de abono. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
Sebastiana is a member of the 'Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata' community bank. This very friendly bank is located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco, in a village called Yuncaypata. This is a typical small village where people preserve their pure Andean heritage and live in communities, which support each other at sowing and harvest time, caring for their children and their animals. It is a very pretty village whose inhabitants speak Quechua. It is located in Cusco department.
Sebastiana is 41 years old, married, and has four children aged 18, 13, 10 and 8. Sebastiana works in farming and also has some animals (guinea pigs, hens, pigs and sheep). She sells grains and cereals. She produces lupins (for the seeds), wheat, barley and beans which she takes to the market in Cusco every Saturday to sell. She would like this loan so that she can, once more, sow her crops and sell them. She will buy seeds, pay for a tractor to come and turn over her land, and then, a month later, she will spread manure on her land. She is requesting this loan to invest in buying seeds to sow, to pay for use of a tractor and to buy manure.
Sebastiana is grateful for this loan and values it. She pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner as she has with her previous loans.

loan.use: to invest in buying seeds to sow, to pay for use of a tractor and to buy manure

loan.name: Abelina

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Abelinaa; la socia tiene 42 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 5 hijos de los cuales solo vive con los de 16 y 14 aos de edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura y tambin tiene animales menores, la socia tiene cuyes, gallinas, chanchos, ovejas, la socia tambin tiene una tienda de abarrotes y se dedica a la venta de verduras, la socia en esta ocasin desea el crdito para comprar todo referente a productos de abarrotes como son, arroz, azcar, fideos, harinas, leche, enlatados y otros productos que en la zona no se encuentra y escasea mucho. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de abarrotes como azcar, arroz entre otros. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
Abilina belongs to the "Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata" Village Bank. It's a very nice bank located thirty minutes from the city of Cusco, in the village of Yuncaypata, a typical village where they keep up all the Andean traditions and everyone lives together in the community, helping each other out during planting and harvesting seasons, and caring for the children and animals. It's a very pretty Quechua-speaking village in the department of Cusco.
Abilinaa is forty-two, married, and has five children; only the fourteen- and sixteen-year-old live with her. She works in agriculture and has young animals, including guinea pigs, hens, pigs, and sheep. She also has a grocery store and she sells vegetables.
At this time, Abilina would like a loan to buy all kinds of grocery items, like rice, sugar, noodles, flour, milk, canned goods and other items because these products can't be found in this area and people often run short. Abilina appreciates and values the loans she gets at the bank and she promises to make her payments in a disciplined manner as has with her prior loans.

loan.use: to invest in the purchase of grocery items like sugar, rice, etc.

loan.name: Omar Abel

texts.es: El seor Omar Abel se dedica a la venta de productos varios, como ser: controles para televisor y equipo de sonido, extensiones para electricidad, tomas corrientes, cortaas, pasta dental, focos de mano, bateras, prestobarbas, candados, espejos, tijeras, etc, sus ventas las realiza ambulantemente en la ciudad de San Lorenzo, tambien viaja en autobs hasta la frontera de Honduras - El Salvador a vender sus productos, Omar vive con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, dos de ellos van a la escuela de la comunidad. Omar utilizara el credito para comprar mercaderia y asi tener mas inventario de sus productos, sus clientes son las personas que viajan de El Salvador a Honduras y viceversa. Su sueo es tener un lugar estable donde vender sus productos y no tener que viajar da a da.
texts.en:
Seor Omar Abel sells various products such as: controls for televisions and sound systems, electric extensions, sockets, nail clippers, tooth paste, flashlights, batteries, prestobarbas (3-blade razors), locks, mirrors, scissors etc. He is a street vendor in the city of San Lorenzo. He also travels by bus to the Honduras-El Salvador border to sell his products. Omar lives with his wife and 4 children, two of which go to the local school.
Omar will use the loan to buy merchandise and so have a more extensive inventory of products. His customers are people who travel from el Salvador to Honduras and vice versa.
His dream is to have a permanent location to sell his products and not have to travel every day.

loan.use: to buy controls for television and sound equipment, electric extensions, nail clippers, toothpaste, flashlights, batteries, razors, padlocks, mirrors, scissors

loan.name: Jeannette

texts.es: Jeannette tiene 30 aos, es una mujer alegre, amable y trabajadora, convive con su pareja, con quien tiene dos hijos de 6 y 2 aos. Juntos habitan en casa de su suegra. EL trabajo al que se dedica es la venta de zapatos, mercadera que trae de otra ciudad. Previamente sus clientes le hacen el pedido y al cabo de un tiempo un proveedor es el que trae la mercadera solicitada. Ella est contenta con su trabajo, pues los diseos que venden son variados y gusta del cliente. Ella considera muy rentable su negocio, que gracias a ello puede ayudar a su parejar a solventar los gastos del hogar, por tanto espera invertir ms en su negocio para que pueda consolidarse. Este ser el primer crdito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes. Con el monto solicitado comprar ms calzados, adems que intentar comprar un stand donde pueda exhibir sus productos.
texts.en:
Jeannette is 30 years old. She is a cheerful, kind and hard-working woman who lives with her partner. The couple have two children aged 6 and 2. They live together in her mother-in-law's house.
Jeannette's business is selling shoes. This is merchandise that she brings back from another city. Her customers make orders with her in advance and, after a certain period of time, a supplier brings the merchandise they have requested. Jeannette is happy with her work as the designs she sells are varied and please her customers. She considers her business to be very profitable and it has enabled her to help her partner cover their household expenses. For this reason, she hopes to invest further in her business so that she can consolidate it.
This will be Jeannette's first loan from MFP and she hopes to receive your support. She will use the sum she has requested to buy more footwear. She will also try to buy a stand where she can display her products.

loan.use: to buy more shoes and a stand

loan.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es: La Sra. Sara es la presidenta D. la alcanca MARIA AUXILIADORA tiene 6 hijos los cuales son mayores D. edad, la cualidades que resaltan en Sara son el respeto, puntualidad y cooperacin, se dedica al negocio D. la venta D. productos D. belleza ya hace mas D. 2 aos, el sueo que quiere cumplir es tener una bodega para as poder tener un sustento en el futuro, el prstamo que adquiri lo utilizara en la compra D. mas productos.
texts.en: Senora Sara is the president of the communal bank MARIA AUXILIADORA. She has 6 children who are all adults. The personal qualities exemplified by Senora Sara are respect, punctuality and cooperation. She has been selling beauty products for more than 2 years. The dream she wants to realize is to have a store in order to have a livelihood in the future. The loan she has taken will be used to buy more products.

loan.use: to buy merchandise.

borrower.first_name: Ramos Pelayo De Varela Gloria Olinda
Velasquez Torres De Mendoza Paula Maria

loan.name: Juan Ramon

texts.es: El seor Juan, de 65 aos, habita en la Ciudad de Len, esta casado, es padre de 3 hijos, el es comerciante se dedica a reparar bicicletas aunque el aprendi el oficio de mecnico de aviacin, trabajo en el aeropuerto hace 45 aos pero al cumplir cierta edad lo despidieron entonces decidi poner su propio negocio y puso su propio taller de reparaciones de Bicicletas. Solicito el prstamo para comprar accesorios, repuestos para todo tipo de bicicleta y hacer mejoras su negocio. Este inversin le ayudara adquirir inventario de repuestos que necesita, a vender mas piezas de bicicletas que le son de mucha demanda y darle una mejor apariencia a su negocio para hacerlo mas atractivo. Su prxima meta a seguir es pintar su negocio y ampliarlo mas.
texts.en:
Seor Juan is 65 years old and lives in the city of Leon. He is married and is the father of 3 children. He is a businessman and repairs bicycles although he trained as an aircraft mechanic. He worked at the airport for 45 years but on reaching a certain age he was fired. He then decided to start his own business and set up his own bicycle repair workshop.
He is asking for the loan to buy accessories and spare parts for all types of bicycles to improve his business. This investment will help him purchase parts he needs for his inventory, sell more bicycle parts which are in big demand and give his businesss a better appearance to make it more attractive. His next goal is to paint the business premises and expand it more.
,

loan.use: to buy accessories, spare parts for all types of biicycle to improve his business.

loan.name: Biviana

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN D. YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos D. la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca D. siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento D. Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Biviana; la socia tiene 56 aos D. edad, la socia es casada y tiene 5 hijos D. los cuales ya 4 D. ellos son independientes, el menor tiene 15 aos D. edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura y se dedica tambin a la crianza D. animales como aves D. corral, chanchos, ovejas y vaca, la socia venD. los animales menores en el mercado en la ciudad D. Cusco, la socia desea invertir el crdito para aumentar sus animales, ella comprara pollos doble pechuga, cuyes 20 D. ellos, chanchos 2 y un par D. ovejas. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra D. animales menores para criar y vender. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
Biviana belongs to the Virgen del Carmen D. Yuncaypata Communal Bank. This very friendly bank is located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco in a village called Yuncaypata. This is a typical small village where people preserve their pure Andean heritage. They live in communities that support each other at sowing and harvest time, caring for their children and their animals. It is a very pretty village whose inhabitants speak Quechua. It is located in Cusco department.
Biviana, age 56, is married and has five children. Four of her children are independent, and the youngest is 15. She works in agriculture, and she also raises animals like poultry, pigs, sheep, and cows. She sells the small animals in the market in the city of Cusco.
She wishes to use the loan to get more animals. She will buy double breasted chickens, 20 guinea pigs, 2 pigs, and a pair of sheep. She is requesting the loan to buy small animals to raise and sell. She is grateful for this loan and values it. She pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner as she has with her previous loans.

loan.use: to buy small animals to raise and sell.

loan.name: Hugo Ren

texts.es: El seor Hugo es Soltero, domiciliado en la Ciudad de Curuguaty. Es de profesin carpintero con ms de 12 aos de experiencia, realiza todo tipo de trabajo en madera (muebles finos de cocina, dormitorios, placares en general). La Carpintera se encuentra ubicado en el predio de la casa de sus padres, donde tiene todas las herramientas, adems acaba de comprar una cierra para cortar rollos de madera. Comenta que da a da se esfuerza mucho para poder salir adelante y que gracias a su trabajo sea conocido en el barrio. Con su trabajo tambin ayuda a sus padres con los gastos que ellos tienen, pues desea de alguna manera poder retribuirles todo lo que ellos haban gastado por el. Necesita el crdito para la compra de inmueble que se encuentra ubicado al lado de su vivienda, el cual utilizar para poder ampliar su taller de carpintera. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que esta le brinda, pues de obtener el crdito lo ayudar mucho en su microempresa.
texts.en:
Hugo is single and lives in the town of Curuguatay. He is a carpenter by profession and has more than 12 years experience. He carries out all kinds of work in wood (high-quality kitchen furniture, bedroom furniture, wardrobes).
Hugo's carpentry workshop is located on his parents' property where he has all his tools. He has also just bought a saw for cutting rolls of wood. He says that he works hard every day to get ahead in life and, thanks to his work, he is well known in his neighborhood. Through his work, he also helps his parents with their expenses as he would like to somehow be able to return to them all the money that they have spent on him.
Hugo needs this loan to buy some real estate which is located next to his home. He will use this to expand his carpentry workshop. He is grateful to Fundacin Paraguaya for the opportunity that they are giving him as this loan will help him a lot in his micro-business.

loan.use: to buy some property to expand his carpentry workshop

loan.name: Merling Jamileth

texts.es: Merling de 36 aos de edad es soltera, tiene 3 hijos, 2 mayores y la menor de 7 aos. Esta solicitando su 4to credito con el proposito de comprar productos para su pequeo negocio de venta de oro y plata. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien asume los gastos del hogar. Su mayor sueo es poder incrementar su negocio para asi obtener ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Merling is 36 years old and single. She has three children, two are grown and the youngest is seven years old.
She is requesting her fourth loan to buy products for her small business of selling gold and silver. Her husband supports her; he takes on the household expenses.
Her biggest dream is to be able to expand her business in order to get additional income for her family.

loan.use: to buy products for her small business of selling gold and silver.

loan.name: Estefania

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Estefania; la socia tiene 47 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 7 hijos de los cuales solo vive con 3 de sus hijos de 13, 11, 8 aos de edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura en todo lo referente a cereales, ella vende en el mercado de Cusco granos, la socia vende trigo, cebada, quinua, papa, deshidratada, entre otros productos, la socia tiene terrenos de cultivo y mayor mente produce quinua. La socia desea invertir el crdito para la compra de semilla de quinua, trigo, papa, para poder sembrar ahora en estos meses y para ellos requiere comprar la semilla, pagar el tractor que remover y preparara la tierra y luego de un tiempito abonar. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas, pagar al tractor, compra abono para su terreno. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
Estefania belongs to the Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata Communal Bank. This very friendly bank is located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco, in a village called Yuncaypata. This is a typical small village where people preserve their pure Andean heritage. They live in communities, which support each other at sowing and harvest time, caring for their children and their animals. It is a very pretty village whose inhabitants speak Quechua. It is located in Cusco department.
Estefania, age 47, is married and has seven children. She lives with only three of her children; ages 13, 11, and 4. She is a farmer, and she works with everything having to with grains. She sells grain at the market in Cusco. She sells wheat, barley, quinoa, and dried potatoes among other products. She has fields where she primarily produces quinoa.
She wishes to use the loan to buy quinoa, wheat, and potato seeds in order to be able to plant now in these months. In order to do so she needs to buy the seeds, pay for the tractor that turns over and prepares the land, and after a time she needs to fertilize the land.
She is requesting the loan to buy seeds, to pay for the use of a tractor, and to buy fertilizer for her land.
She is grateful for this loan and values it. She pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner as she has with her previous loans.

loan.use: to buy seeds, to pay for the use of a tractor, and to buy fertilizer for her land.

loan.name: Ethel

texts.es: La seora Ethel es socia del banco comunal Nuevas Amigas. Distrito D. Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 64 aos D. edad, es viuda y tiene 10 hijos, una D. sus hijas es soltera y vive con ella, es profesora. DesD. hace 10 aos que trabaja con los prstamos D. Manuela Ramos. Como madre responsable, al enviudar tuvo que trabajar mucho para mantener a sus hijos y poder darles estudios, gracias a su esfuerzo lo consigui. Con su nuevo prstamo D. S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprar: 20 fierros cortos, 5 barretas, 10 martillos, Su negocio est muy bien implementado, el local es alquilado y ella se dedica todo el dia al negocio, la ayuda un joven quien se encarga D. realizar las cargas D. materiales cuando los clientes lo solicitan. Manuela Ramos ha brindado la ayuda a las personas que lo necesitan y la seora Ethel es una D. esas personas afortunadas y ha sabido manejar bien su dinero.
texts.en:
Seora Ethel is a member of the communal bank Nuevas Amigas in the Calleria district in the department of Ucayali. She is 64 years old, a widow with 10 children. One of her daughters, a teacher, is single and lives with her.
She has been working with the Manuala Ramos loans for 10 years. As a responsible mother, on becoming a widow she had to work hard to raise her children and to give them an education. Thanks to her efforts she succeeded.
With her new loan of 1,000.00 nuevos soles (PEN) she will buy: 20 short irons, 5 jimmies,10 hammers. Her business is very well set up. The premises are rented and she spends all day at work. A young man helps her with requests for materials when customers make them. Manuela Ramos has provided assistance to people in need and Seora Ethel is one of those lucky people and has known how to manage her money well.

loan.use: to buy jimmies.

loan.name: Nelson Yovany

texts.es:
El seor Nelson Yovany se dedica a la venta de productos de uso domestico, sus ventas las realiza ambulantemente en la ciudad de San Lorenzo, tambienn viaja a la frontera con El Salvador para vender sus productos, Nelson vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos, los cuales estan estudiando en la escuela de la comunidad. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia y asi tener mas variedad de productos, sus clientes son las personas que viajan.
el sueo de Nelson es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Seor Nelson Yovany sells household products. He is a street vendor in the town of San Lorenzo. He also travels to the border with El Salvador to sell his products. Nelson lives with his wife and 2 children, who are both studying at the local school. He will use the loan to buy merchandise and thus have a bigger variety of products. His customers are people who travel.
Nelson's dream is to have a house of his own.

loan.use: to buy tooth brushes, toothpaste, nail clippers, flashlights, batteries, razors, locks, mirrors, scissors, electric extensions.

loan.name: Sofia Marina

texts.es: La seora Sofa es socia del banco comunal Siete Estrellas del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento De Ucayali, tiene 48 aos de edad, eat casada y tiene dos hijos, su esposo es trabajador independiente. Ella se dedica a la venta de lencera, son 10 aos que viene trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, los prstamos le sirven para comprar su mercadera y seguir implementando cada da ms su negocio. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 3,000.00 nuevos soles comprar: 3 docenas de truzas, 5 docenas de brasieres, 2 docenas de bxer, 3 docenas de ropa interior para caballeros, 1 docena de fajas, 1 docena de modeladores para nias. Nos cuenta que segocio le est dando muchas satisfacciones, est viendo el fruto de su trabajo y se siente feliz porque puede ayudar a sus hijos cuando ellos lo necesitan, su esposo tambin aporta para los gastos bsicos del hogar, espera seguir trabajando con Manuela Ramos, sus hijos ya son mayores y ninguno est a su cargo.
texts.en:
Seora Sofa is a member of the communal bank Siete Estrellas in the district of Calleria in the department of Ucayali. She is 48 years old, married and has 2 children. Her husband works for himself.
She sells lingerie. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos loans for 10 years. The loans are used by her to buy merchandise and continue growing her business every day.
With her new loan of 3,000.00 nuevos soles (PEN) she will buy: 3 dozen briefs, 5 dozen brasieres, 2 dozen boxer shorts, 3 dozen pairs of men underwear, 1 dozen corsets, 1 dozen girls bras.
She tells us that being a member is giving her great satisfaction; she is seeing the fruit of her labour and she feels happy because she can help her children when they need it. Her husband also provides for basic household expenses. She hopes to continue working with Manuela Ramos. Her children are both adults and no longer dependents.

loan.use: to buy underwear.

loan.name: Julia

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Julia; la socia tiene39 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos de 17, 15, 12, 7 aos de edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura y a la crianza de animales menores, la socia cra cuyes, ovejas y vacas, la socia, se dedica al venta de cuyes en especial, la socia tiene este negocio desde hace 6 aos y le va muy bien aparte de la agricultura y la venta de sus otros animales, ala socia tiene ms de 80 cuyes y ya tiene comprador, la socia desea invertir el crdito en la compra de alimento para sus animales y comprar nuevos cuyes. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de animales menores para criar y vender. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA. This is a friendly communal bank that is located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco in the village called Yuncaypata. This is a typical little village in that it retains its pure Andean heritage, and they live together in a supporting community, planting and harvesting, caring for their children and their animals, in a very pretty town where they speak Quechua, and in the department of Cusco.
Our member, Julia, is 39 years of age, married and has 4 children who are 17, 15, 12 and 7 years old. She works in agriculture and breeding little animals such as guinea pigs, and sheep, and cows. She specializes in guinea pigs. She has had this business for 6 years, and it is going well. Other than the agriculture and selling of other animals, she has more than 80 guinea pigs that already have a buyer. With the money from the loan she wants to buy animal feed and more guinea pigs. She is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of small animals to breed and sell. She is happy and grateful for the loan from the communal bank and promises to make her payments on time as she has done in the past.

loan.use: to invest in the purchase of small animals to breed and sell

loan.name: Mario Cesar

texts.es: El seor Mario es soltero, tiene 28 aos de edad, vive con sus padres, reside en la ciudad de Curuguaty. Es propietario de una parada de Taxi que se compr con la ayuda de sus padres, cuenta con un auto que est a su nombre, en cual trabaja todos los das cubriendo el itinerario de Curuguaty Salto del Guaira. Hace como un ao que trabaja en esto. Comenta que tiene muchos clientes puesto que hay pocos mnibus por esos lugares. Adems de eso, optan por el servicio tambin por el confort y la rapidez. Dice que todo su esfuerzo es para ayudar a su familia con los gastos de la casa, ya que la vida est muy dura El solicita el crdito para la compra de cubiertas para su taxi, ya que necesitan un mantenimiento, para que con eso pueda ofrecer mayor seguridad a sus pasajeros.
texts.en:
Mario is single. He is 28 years old and lives with his parents in the town of Curuguaty.
Mario owns a taxi stand which he bought with the help of his parents. He has a car in his name which he uses every day to work the Curuguaty - Salto del Guaira taxi route. He has been in this business for one year. He tells us that he has a lot of customers as there are few buses in these places. Also, people opt for a taxi service for comfort and speed. He says that he works hard so that he can help his family with their household expenses as life is very hard.
Mario is requesting this loan to buy tires for his taxi as they need maintenance so that he can offer better safety to his passengers.

loan.use: to buy tires for his taxi

loan.name: Basilia

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Basilia; la socia tiene 45 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 5 hijos de 15, 18, 26, 24, 20 aos de edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura y a criar animales como aves de corral, chanchos, ovejas y vaca, la socia lleva a vender sus productos como cereales a la ciudad de Cusco en los diferentes mercados, la socia ahora desea el crdito solo por esta vez para invertir en los acabados de sus vivienda, la socia y su esposo terminaron de construir su casa y ahora desean revestir la fachada, la socia est muy feliz de poder lograr el acabado de sus propia casa les cost tanto hacer cada paso que ahora solo quieren terminarla. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de yeso, estuco, y todo lo referente a los pagos a los obreros para hacer el revestimiento de su fachada en su vivienda. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA. This is a friendly communal bank that is located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco in the village called Yuncaypata. This is a typical little village in that it retains its pure Andean heritage, and they live together in a supporting community, planting and harvesting, caring for their children and their animals, in a very pretty town where they speak Quechua, and in the department of Cusco.
Brasilia, a member of the communal bank is 45 years old, married with 5 children who are 26, 24, 20, 18, and 15 years old. She works in agriculture and raising animals such as poultry, pigs, sheep and cows. She sells her products such as cereal in various markets in the city of Cusco.
She is asking for a loan at this time to finish her house. She and her husband completed building their house and now want to cover the facade. She is very happy to be able to finish off her own house where each step cost so much and now only wants to complete it. She is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of plaster, stucco, and related expenses to pay the workers for covering the facade of her home. She is thankful and grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time as she has done in her previous loans.

loan.use: to buy plaster, stucco, and to pay workers the related expenses for covering the facade of her house

loan.name: Theolith

texts.es:
Theolith tiene 58 aos y es socia del Banco Comunal "Mujeres Valerosas II del distrito Tarapoto del departamento San Martn. Est casada y tiene a una hija y un hijo mayor de edad.
Se dedica a la costura y confeccin, trabaj primero en una tienda, pero por mal trato decidi empezar su propio negocio. Este negocio lo tiene desde hace ms de 30 aos y en este tiempo ha podido conseguir una clientela fija que tambin da las recommenaciones a otra gente. Sin embargo le gustara crecer y tener una tienda muy grande. Con este nuevo prstamo de S/. 2,5000.00 piensa invertir una parte en publicidad, la otra parte en la compra de telas e hilos para la confeccin de prendas.
Nos cuenta que le gusta los temas que son tratados en las reuniones. Dice que antes no saba en verdad cmo tratar a los clientes. Est muy contenta ya que gracias a los prstamos su negocio ha crecido.
texts.en:
Theolith is 58 years old and is a member of the communal bank "Mujeres Valerosas II" of the Tarapoto district in the department of San Martn. She is married with a daughter, and 1 adult child.
She makes and sews clothing. At first she worked in a store, but because of bad treatment she decided to begin her own business. She has been doing this for more than 30 years, and has a steady clientele, and they recommend her services to others. Nonetheless she wants to grow and have a very large store.
She wants to use this loan of $925 in part for advertising and partly to purchase fabric and thread for making clothes. She tells us that she likes the things they talk about at the meetings. She says that she didnt know before about good customer service. She is very happy, and thanks to the loans her business has grown.

loan.use: to advertise and to buy fabric and thread

loan.name: Edilberto

texts.es:
El seor Edilberto se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, sus ventas las realiza ambulantemente en la frontera de El Salvador - Honduras y sus clientes son las personas que viajan y que ocupan de estos productos para el viaje, mas que todo son personas que manejan equipo pesado. Edilberto vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos que van a la escuela de la comunidad. el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia y asi estar mas surtido ya que las necesidades de sus clientes son mas grandes.
Su sueo es remodelar su vivienda y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Edilberto sells personal care products and conducts his business at the border between El Salvador and Honduras. His clients are people who travel and use his products for their trips, and the majority of customers are people that handle heavy equipment.
Edilberto lives with his wife and their two children who attend a community school. This loan will be used to purchase merchandise and enable him to offer his customers a greater variety of products to meet their growing needs. Edilberto's dream is to remodel his home and provide a better quality of life for his family.

loan.use: to purchase toothpaste, toothbrushes, flashlights, razors and batteries to offer his customers

loan.name: Avelina

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Avelina; la socia tiene60 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 4 hijos los cuales ya son todos ellos independientes; la socia se dedica a criar animales menores como gallinas, cuyes, chanchos los cuales los vende, ella trabaja en este negocio estos ltimos aos debido a que solo desea distraerse y reunirse con esta simptica escusa con sus vecinos y amistades, la socia desea comprar chanchos y gallinas doble pechugas para criarlos y luego venderlos. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de animales menores como comprar gallinas y chanchos. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA bank. This friendly bank is located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco in the village called Yuncaypata. This is a typical small village, in that it conserves its pure Andean heritage and they live together as a community, helping each other at sowing and harvest times, and looking after each other's children and animals. It is a very pretty village, and they speak the Quechua language. It is in the Department of Cusco.
The member is Seora Avelina. She is 60 years old. The member is married with four children, who are all financially independent. The member works raising small animals such as chickens, guinea-pigs, and pigs, which she sells. She has been working in this business for the last several years, as she wanted to occupy herself and this is a nice excuse to meet with neighbors and friends.
The member wants to buy pigs and double-breasted chickens to raise and later sell. The member is requesting the loan to invest in small animals such as chickens and pigs.
The member is grateful and appreciates being able to get a loan through these means. She agrees to comply with the terms in a disciplined manner, just as she has done with his previous loans.

loan.use: to invest in the purchase of small animals, such as chickens and pigs.

loan.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz tiene 30 aos es casada y vive en Otavalo al norte de Ecuador. Luz se describe como una mujer emprendedora y felz. En la fotografa Luz es la seora que est a la izquierda las otras dos personas son familiares que le ayudan en su pequeo negocio.
Trabaja con su familia en la elaboracin de manillas a mano. Trabaja con Fodemi por 6 aos el actual crdito que solicit es para la compra de materia prima como es hilo, lana, mullos, perlas de plstico etc para incrementar su produccin y de esa manera poder mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos lo cual le ayuda para dar el estudio a sus hijos.
Su sueo es tener un local propio para su negocio y poder incrementar su produccin teniendo ayudantes y poder pagarles.
texts.en:
Luz is 30 years old and is married. She lives in Otavalo in the north of Ecuador. Luz describes herself as an enterprising and cheerful woman, In the photo, Luz is the woman on the left; the other two are family members who help her with her small business. She works with her family making bracelets by hand.
She has been working with Fodemi for six years. The loan that she is currently requesting is for the purchase of raw materials such as thread, wool, beads, plastic beads, etc., for increasing her production and in this way improving her sales and income. This will help her to provide her children with an education.
Her dream is to have her own premises for her business, and to be able to grow her production by having employees and being able to pay them.

loan.use: To buy raw material such as thread, wool, beads, plastic beads, etc.

loan.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: La socia pertenece al banco VIRGEN DEL CARMEN DE YUNCAYPATA; este banco muy simptico est ubicado a 30 minutos de la Ciudad del Cusco en el poblado llamado Yuncaypata, este es un tpico pueblito en el que se conserva toda la herencia andina pura, y viven todos en comunidad apoyndose en la poca de siembra y cosecha, cuidando a sus hijos y a sus animales, es un pueblo muy bonito y es quechua hablante, est en el departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Luz Marina; la socia tiene33 aos de edad, la socia es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 14, 9, 1 aos de edad; la socia trabaja en agricultura y se dedica tambin a la crianza de animales como cuyes, ella est especializada en la crianza solo por ahora de cuyes y los lleva a vender a los restaurantes tursticos, la socia desea el crdito para invertir en la compra de alimento, vitaminas y de cuyes desea comprar 50 cuyes para aumentar sus galpn cuyero, la socia invertir el prstamo en la jaula, alimento y compra de cuyes. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar 50 cuyes, alimento para ellos y vitaminas, tambin arreglara el espacio acondicionando sus jaulas para recibir a mas cuyes. La socia agradece y valora el prstamo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir disciplinadamente como lo ha ido haciendo con sus anteriores crditos.
texts.en:
This member, Mrs. Luz Marina, belongs to a communal bank called 'Virgen del Carmen de Yuncaypata', a very friendly bank located 30 minutes from the city of Cusco, in the village of Yuncaypata. This is a typical Andean village which has retained it's pure heritage. Everyone lives communally, supporting each other through the periods of planting and harvesting, caring for their children and animals. It is a beautiful Quechua-speaking town, in the administrative division of Cusco.
Luz Marina is 33 years old, and married with three children aged 19, 14 and one. She works in agriculture and also raises animals such as guinea pigs, which she specializes in and brings them to popular tourist restaurants to sell. Luz Marina has requested the loan to invest in the purchase of a cage, food and vitamins, and wants to buy 50 guinea pigs so that she can boost her guinea pig shed. She also wants to prepare and fix up the cage space she has so that she can host more guinea pigs.
Luz Marina is grateful and appreciates the loan granted through this channel. She is disciplined and committed to repaying this loan as she has done with her previous loans.

loan.use: to purchase 50 guinea pigs, food and vitamins for them, and also to fix and prepare cage space so that she can house more guinea pigs

loan.name: Maria Beatriz

texts.es: Maria tiene 28 aos de edad, es soltera, tiene una hija y vive con su mam quien es viuda, ellas viven en la ciudad de Carapegu. Es muy emprendedora y trabajadora, teje frazadas y sobrecamas, con la ayuda de su mam de quien aprendi el oficio, luego lo comercializan en la ciudad. Cuenta que vive con su mam debido a que se quedo sola desde el fallecimiento de su padre.Hoy en da cuenta con clientela formada por la calidad de sus productos y gracias a la amabilidad con que trata a sus clientes. Ella solicita el prstamo para la compra de hilos y color para tejer frazadas que en sta temporada le solicitan mucho sus clientes. Agradece a la Fundacin por la oportunidad que le brinda, pues de obtener el crdito le ser de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Maria is 28 years old, single, and has one daughter. She lives with her mom, who is a widow, in the city of Carapegu.
Maria is very entrepreneurial and hard-working. She weaves blankets and bedspreads with the help of her mom, from whom she learned the trade. They then sell their goods in the city. Maria tells us that she lives with her mom because she was left alone after her father died. Maria has an established customer base owing to the quality of her products and thanks to the kindness with which she treats her customers.
Maria is requesting a loan to buy threads and dyes for weaving blankets which are in great demand with her customers during this season. She is grateful to Fundacin Paraguaya for the opportunity that they are giving her. This loan will be very helpful to her.

loan.use: to buy threads and dyes for weaving blankets

loan.name: Dulce Hogar (Manta) Group

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Mi Dulce Hogar se rene cada 15 das en Las Cumbres en la ciudad de Manta, ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda poca del ao y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos tursticos.
Este es un grupo de personas que decidieron unirse hace 4 meses atrs y formar este Grupo De Crdito que les ha servido de mucho para aumentar sus negocios. Ellos se dedican a diversas actividades tales como, comercio en general, venta de comida, servicios, entre otras actividades.
En este lugar vive la seora Suliana, tiene 33 aos de edad y mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 14 y 6 aos de edad los mismos que estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido es chofer.
Nuestra amiga es una mujer muy trabajadora ya que se dedica a diversas actividades, ella por temporadas vende ropa de todo tipo, productos naturales y tambin se dedica a coser ropa, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y tambin vende en su casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando necesitan un producto o necesitan que les confeccione alguna prenda de vestir. Entre sus productos el que ms vende son los energizantes. Lleva tres aos que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
Este crdito lo va emplear en comprar productos naturales en especial los energizantes. Est en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio, es la presidenta del grupo y le gusta por la ayuda que dan con los crditos.
Sus sueos son tener un gran taller de costura y un almacn.
texts.en:
The Mi Dulce Hogar communal bank meets every 15 days in Las Cumbres in the city of Manta, known for its beautiful beaches, which are visited at all times of the year, and also for being a city of unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions.
